usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box
        as="ul"
        sx={{
          m: 0,
          p: 2,
          listStyleType: 'none',
          overflowY: 'auto',
          flexGrow: 1
        }}
        {...testIdProps('command-menu-filtered-commands')}
      >
        {scoredMenuItems.filteredItems.map((menuItem, i) => (
          <MenuItem
            key={menuItem[1].description}
            menuItem={menuItem}
            onPointerMove={() => pointerSetSelectedItemIndex(i)}
            onPointerLeave={() => pointerSetSelectedItemIndex(null)}
            currentPath={path}
            isSelected={selectedMenuItem === menuItem}
            onClick={onActivateMenuItem}
            shouldScrollToSelectedMenuItem={shouldScrollToSelectedMenuItem}
            positionData={scoredMenuItems.positionData.get(menuItem)}
            showPath={
              shortcutsEnabled &&
              (isShortcutMode || isCommandTree(menuItem[1]) || menuItem[0][menuItem[0].length - 1] !== BACKSPACE_STR)
            }
            showFullPath={isPaletteMode}
          />
        ))}
      </Box>

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<Box
      sx={{
        alignItems: 'stretch',
        borderTop: '1px solid',
        borderColor: 'border.default',
        px: 4,
        py: 2,
        pt: 1,
        display: 'flex'
      }}
    >
      <PathSegment segment="Commands" segmentPath={[]} isRoot={true} isFinal={false} setPath={setPath} />

      {trail.map(([segmentPath, segment], i) => (
        <PathSegment
          key={i}
          segment={segment}
          segmentPath={segmentPath}
          isRoot={false}
          isFinal={i === trail.length - 1}
          setPath={p => setPath(p)}
        />
      ))}
    </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box as="li" ref={uglyRef} onPointerMove={onPointerMove} onPointerLeave={onPointerLeave} sx={{display: 'flex'}}>
      <StyledButton className={className} sx={unstyledButtonStyles} onClick={onClickWrapper} isSelected={isSelected}>
        {positionData ? (
          <HighlightedText
            text={item.description}
            chunks={positionData?.chunks ?? []}
            fontWeight="normal"
            color="fg.muted"
            ml={2}
            sx={{flex: 1}}
          />
        ) : (
          <Text sx={{flex: 1, fontWeight: 'normal', color: 'fg.muted', ml: 2}}>{item.description}</Text>
        )}

        {showPath && <ItemPath itemPath={path} />}
      </StyledButton>
    </Box>

usage.name: Text
usage.text:
<Text sx={{color: isPaletteMode ? 'fg.muted' : 'fg.default', fontSize: 0, opacity: isPaletteMode ? 0.8 : 1}}>
        {itemPath.reduce<Array<JSX.Element>>((children, segment, i) => {
          children.push(
            <Fragment key={i}>
              {segment}

              {i < itemPath.length - 1 && <Text sx={{color: 'fg.muted', px: 1}}></Text>}
            </Fragment>
          )

          return children
        }, [])}
      </Text>

        onClick={handleTracksClick}
        sx={{
          p: 0,
          borderRadius: 3,
          '&:focus-visible': {

      </Button>
    </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{display: 'flex', mr: 1}}>
        {
          // NOTE: this is using an older hovercards endpoint that accepts a userId.  Once we start fetching users by id, we can use "/users/:username/hovercard"
        }
        {items.slice(0, maxVisible).map((user, index) => {
          return (
            <StyledAvatarBox
              {...testIdProps('memex-avatar-stack-item')}
              key={user.id}
              backgroundColorThemeValue={backgroundColorThemeValue}
              sx={{
                zIndex: index
              }}
            >
              <StyledAvatar
                {...testIdProps(`memex-avatar-state-${user.isIdle ? 'idle' : 'active'}`)}

        sx={{

          width: '480px',

          top: '20%',
          '&::before': {content: 'none !important'},
          '&::after': {content: 'none !important'}

        <Heading sx={{fontSize: 3, mb: 2}}>{header}</Heading>
        <ProgressBar bg={progressBackground} progress={progress} sx={{marginBottom: '15px'}} />
        <MigrationOverlayDescription
          migration={prevMigrationState}
          statusMessage={getStatusMessageFromMigration(prevMigrationState)}

          closeOverlay={closeOverlay}

usage.name: TabNav
usage.text:
<TabNav
        role="tablist"
        aria-orientation="horizontal"
        aria-label="Select view"
        sx={{px: [3, 4, 5], bg: 'canvas.inset'}}
        {...testIdProps('tab-nav')}
      >
        {views.map(view => {
          const selected = view.number === currentView?.number && isProjectViewRoute
          return (
            <ViewNavigationTab
              key={view.number}
              selected={selected}
              onTabChange={(e: React.MouseEvent) => {
                // prevent link from trigger navigation, as view state will do this, but show an href
                e.preventDefault()
                if (selected) return
                setCurrentViewNumber(view.number, {ui: TabNavigationUI})
              }}
              view={view}
            />
          )
        })}

        {!isNewMemex && hasWritePermissions && views.length < MAX_VIEWS_PER_PAGE && (
          <TabNav.Link
            key="new"
            as="button"
            sx={{position: 'relative', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', cursor: 'pointer', margin: '0'}}
            onClick={() => createNewDefaultView({ui: TabNavigationUI})}
            {...testIdProps('view-navigation-create-new-view')}
          >
            <StyledOcticon icon={PlusIcon} sx={{color: 'fg.muted', mr: 2}} />
            <Text
              sx={{
                '&:hover': {color: 'fg.default'},
                overflow: 'hidden',
                whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
                color: 'fg.muted'
              }}
            >
              New view
            </Text>
          </TabNav.Link>
        )}
      </TabNav>

        width: '150px',
        maxWidth: 'max-content',
        minWidth: selected || isNewMemex ? 'min-content' : undefined,
        px: 3
      }}

usage.text:
<TabNav.Link
      ref={
        ref as React.RefObject<any> /**
      Not sure there's any better way to handle that the 
      ref is a polymorphic type based on the 'as' prop
    */
      }
      selected={selected}
      role="tab"
      aria-selected={selected ? 'true' : undefined}
      // ensure current tab is not interactive
      as={selected || isNewMemex ? 'div' : NavLinkWithoutActiveClassName}
      to={
        selected || isNewMemex ? undefined : PROJECT_VIEW_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber, viewNumber: view.number})
      }
      sx={{
        cursor: 'pointer',
        display: 'flex',
        alignItems: 'center',
        margin: 0,
        flexGrow: 1,
        width: '150px',
        maxWidth: 'max-content',
        minWidth: selected || isNewMemex ? 'min-content' : undefined,
        px: 3
      }}
      title={view.name}
      onMouseDown={onTabChange}
      onClick={onTabChange}
      {...testIdProps('view-navigation-view-tab-link')}
    >
      <ViewTab view={view} selected={selected} />
      {view.isViewStateDirty && !selected && (
        <PotentiallyDirty
          key={`dirty-for-${view.number}`}
          isDirty={true}
          hideDirtyState={!hasWritePermissions}
          sx={{top: '-5px', left: '-4px'}}
        />
      )}
    </TabNav.Link>

usage.name: Box

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<Box
        onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
        onBlur={onBlur}
        onClick={startEditing}
        sx={
          hasWritePermissions && isEditing
            ? {
                px: 1,
                ml: -1,
                '&:focus-within': {
                  boxShadow: 'primer.shadow.focus',
                  borderRadius: '2'
                },
                '&:hover:not(:focus-within)': {
                  boxShadow: 'primer.shadow.focus',
                  borderRadius: '2'
                }
              }
            : {
                px: 1,
                ml: -1,
                overflow: 'hidden',
                textOverflow: 'ellipsis'
              }
        }
      >
        {selected && isEditing ? (
          <EmojiPicker>
            <AutosizeTextInput
              as={BorderlessTextInput}
              ref={viewNameInputRef}
              sx={{
                fontSize: 1
              }}
              autoComplete="off"
              value={localViewName}
              onChange={onChange}
              onMouseDown={onMouseDown}
              onBlur={onBlur}
              aria-label="Change view name"
              disabled={isNewMemex || !hasWritePermissions || view.isDeleted}
              {...inputCompositionProps}
              {...testIdProps(`view-name-input`)}
            />
          </EmojiPicker>
        ) : (
          <Text
            ref={textElementRef}
            sx={{
              color: selected ? 'fg.default' : 'fg.muted',
              '&:hover': {color: 'fg.default'},
              overflow: 'hidden',
              whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
              textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
              maxWidth: '100%'
            }}
            {...testIdProps(`view-name-static`)}
          >
            {localViewName}
          </Text>
        )}
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Box sx={{display: 'flex'}}>
        <Box>
          {hasItems ? (
            <Checkbox
              sx={{mr: 3}}
              onChange={selectAll}
              aria-label="Toggle select all items"
              disabled={isLoadingAllItems}
              {...(isSelectionPartial ? {indeterminate: true} : {checked: hasSelectedAllItems})}
            />
          ) : null}
        </Box>
        <Box>
          {primaryText ? <Text sx={{fontWeight: 'bold'}}>{primaryText}</Text> : null}
          {loaded && hasItems ? (
            <Box>
              {secondaryText ? <Text sx={{color: 'fg.muted', mr: 2}}>{secondaryText}</Text> : null}
              {loadAllText ? (
                <Link
                  as="button"
                  onClick={loadAllAction}
                  disabled={isLoadingAllItems}
                  sx={{
                    color: isLoadingAllItems ? 'primer.fg.disabled' : undefined,
                    ['&&']: {
                      cursor: isLoadingAllItems ? 'default' : 'pointer'
                    }
                  }}
                >
                  {loadAllText}
                </Link>
              ) : null}
            </Box>
          ) : null}
        </Box>
      </Box>

<Box sx={{display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mr: 3}}>
        {isRedactedItem ? null : (
          <ActionMenu>
            <ActionMenu.Anchor>
              <IconButton
                icon={KebabHorizontalIcon}
                variant="invisible"
                aria-label="Open item actions"
                sx={{color: 'fg.default'}}
              />
            </ActionMenu.Anchor>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay>
              <ActionList>
                <ActionList.Item onSelect={restore} disabled={!canRestore}>
                  <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    <HistoryIcon />
                  </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  {canRestore ? (
                    'Restore'
                  ) : (
                    <>
                      Restore unavailable
                      <ActionList.Description variant="block">
                        This will exceed the {projectItemLimit} project item limit
                      </ActionList.Description>
                    </>
                  )}
                </ActionList.Item>
                <ActionList.Item onSelect={remove} variant="danger">
                  <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    <TrashIcon />
                  </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  Delete from project
                </ActionList.Item>
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>
        )}
      </Box>

usage.name: PageLayout
usage.text:
<PageLayout containerWidth="large" rowGap="condensed">
      <PageLayout.Content>
        <Box sx={{position: 'sticky', top: -2, pt: 5, mt: -5, backgroundColor: 'canvas.default', zIndex: 1}}>
          <FilterSuggestionsItemsContext.Provider value={archivedItems ?? fallbackFilterSuggestions}>
            <TokenizedFilterInput
              inputRef={searchInputRef}
              height={filterBarHeight}
              value={filterValue}
              onChange={useCallback(e => setFilterValue(e.target.value), [setFilterValue])}
              onClearButtonClick={useCallback(() => {
                setFilterValue('')
              }, [setFilterValue])}
              containerSx={useMemo(
                () => ({
                  zIndex: '1',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  height: 40,
                  boxShadow: (theme: FixMeTheme) =>
                    `${boxShadowBorder({size: '1px', color: theme.colors.border.default})}, ${
                      theme.shadows.primer.shadow.inset
                    }`,
                  flexShrink: 0,
                  '&.is-focused': {
                    boxShadow: (theme: FixMeTheme) =>
                      `${boxShadowBorder({size: '1px', color: theme.colors.accent.emphasis})}, ${
                        theme.shadows.primer.shadow.focus
                      }`
                  },
                  '&:focus-within': {
                    boxShadow: (theme: FixMeTheme) =>
                      `${boxShadowBorder({size: '1px', color: theme.colors.accent.emphasis})}, ${
                        theme.shadows.primer.shadow.focus
                      }`
                  },
                  pl: '12px',
                  pr: '12px',
                  maxHeight: filterBarHeight
                }),
                []
              )}
              inputContainerSx={useMemo(
                () => ({
                  ml: 2
                }),
                []
              )}
              filterCount={filterValue.trim() ? filteredItems.length : undefined}
              setValueFromSuggestion={setFilterValue}
            />
          </FilterSuggestionsItemsContext.Provider>
          <ArchiveHeader projectItemLimit={projectItemLimit} canBulkRestore={!willSelectionExceedLimit} />
        </Box>

        <ObserverProvider rootRef={null} sizeEstimate={55}>
          <ArchivedItems
            items={filteredItems}
            loaded={loaded}
            hasArchive={archivedItems ? archivedItems.length > 0 : false}
            canRestore={!willSingleRestoreExceedLimit}
            projectItemLimit={projectItemLimit}
          />
        </ObserverProvider>
      </PageLayout.Content>
    </PageLayout>

      {!loaded ? (
        <Loader />
      ) : !hasArchive ? (
        <NoArchivedItems />
      ) : items.length === 0 ? (
        <NoFilteredItems />
      ) : (
        items.map(archivedItem => {
          return (
            <ArchiveItem
              key={archivedItem.id}
              archivedItem={archivedItem}
              columnData={archivedItem.columns}
              canRestore={canRestore}
              projectItemLimit={projectItemLimit}
            />
          )
        })
      )}
    </Box>

usage.name: AnchoredOverlay

props.name: onClose
overlayProps

usage.text:
<AnchoredOverlay
      open={isOpen}
      onOpen={() => setIsOpen(true)}
      onClose={async gesture => {
        if (localContentTypes.length === 0) return
        if (gesture === 'escape') {
          setLocalContentTypes(workflow.contentTypes)
          setIsOpen(false)
          return
        }

        await handleContentTypeChangeRequest.perform(localContentTypes)
        setIsOpen(false)
      }}
      overlayProps={{
        onKeyDown: e => {
          if (e.key === 'Escape') {
            e.preventDefault()
            setLocalContentTypes(workflow.contentTypes)
            setIsOpen(false)
          }
        },
        sx: {color: 'fg.default'}
      }}
      renderAnchor={anchorProps => {
        return (
          <Box {...anchorProps} {...testIdProps('workflows-when-content-types-anchor')}>
            <AutomationPill isEditable={true} isValid={hasSelectedOptions}>
              {pillContents}
            </AutomationPill>
          </Box>
        )
      }}
    >
      <ActionList selectionVariant="multiple" {...testIdProps('workflows-when-content-types-panel')}>
        {actionListItems}
      </ActionList>
    </AnchoredOverlay>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box
      sx={{
        flexDirection: 'column',
        maxWidth: '280px',
        minWidth: '280px',
        mr: 5,
        display: 'flex'
      }}
      {...testIdProps('settings-side-nav')}
    >
      <Heading as="h2" sx={{fontSize: 0, mb: 2, color: 'fg.muted'}}>
        Default workflows
      </Heading>
      <SideNav aria-label="Events" variant="lightweight" sx={{pb: 4, backgroundColor: 'transparent'}}>
        {workflows.map(workflow => {
          const enableable = workflowWithTriggerTypeIsEnableable(workflow.triggerType)
          return (
            <SideNav.Link
              as={NavLinkWithActiveClassName}
              to={{
                pathname: PROJECT_WORKFLOW_ID_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber, workflowId: workflow.id})
              }}
              tabIndex={enableable ? 0 : -1}
              isActive={workflow.id === activeWorkflow.id}
              key={workflow.id}
              sx={{
                py: '8px !important',
                px: '8px !important',
                borderRadius: '6px',
                display: 'flex',
                alignItems: 'center',
                pointerEvents: enableable ? 'auto' : 'none',
                opacity: enableable ? undefined : 0.5,
                '&:hover': {
                  bg: 'neutral.subtle'
                },
                '&.selected, &.selected:hover': {
                  bg: 'border.muted'
                },
                '&.selected .disabled, &.selected:hover .disabled': {
                  color: 'neutral.emphasis'
                }
              }}
            >
              <ProjectWorkflowIcon workflow={workflow} />
              <Box sx={{display: 'flex', flex: 'auto', alignItems: 'baseline'}}>
                <Text sx={{flex: 'auto', color: 'fg.default', fontWeight: 'normal'}}>{workflow.name}</Text>
              </Box>
            </SideNav.Link>
          )
        })}
      </SideNav>
    </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{flexDirection: 'column', flex: 'auto', overflowY: 'hidden', display: 'flex'}}>
        <Box
          {...testIdProps('board-view')}
          ref={scrollRef}
          onPointerDown={onBoardMouseDown}
          onBlur={onBlur}
          onTransitionEnd={onTransitionEnd}
          {...drop.props}
          sx={{
            flex: 'auto',
            height: '0',
            px: [3, 4, 5],
            py: 2,
            overflowY: 'hidden',
            position: 'relative', // Needed to show the column drag-n-drop sash
            display: 'flex',
            ...animation
          }}
        >
          {groupByFieldOptions.map((option, index) => {
            const filteredItems = query
              ? itemsGroupedByField[option.id].filter(matchesSearchQuery)
              : itemsGroupedByField[option.id]
            const isEditable = hasWritePermissions && option.id !== MissingVerticalGroupId
            const isDraggable = groupByField?.dataType !== MemexColumnDataType.Iteration

            return (
              <Column
                key={option.id}
                option={option}
                items={filteredItems}
                index={index}
                deleteColumn={deleteColumn}
                archiveColumn={archiveColumn}
                renameColumn={renameColumn}
                onChange={onColumnChange}
                shouldScrollToBottom={columnShouldScroll === option.id}
                initialNameFocus={lastNewColumnNameRef.current === option.name}
                // TODO: Change this to something that ensures it's an editable column
                // instead of hard-coded MissingStatusColumn.Id.
                isUserEditable={isEditable}
                isDraggable={isDraggable}
                isCurrentIteration={isVerticalGroupCurrentIteration(option)}
                isIteration={groupByField?.dataType === MemexColumnDataType.Iteration}
                iterationDateRange={iterationDateRangeMap.get(option.id) ?? ''}
              />
            )
          })}
          {isCreatingColumn ? <DraftColumn onSave={onDraftSave} onCancel={onDraftCancel} /> : null}
          {hasWritePermissions && <AddNewColumn ref={addNewColumnRef} onClick={addFieldClick} />}
        </Box>
        {hasWritePermissions && (
          <BoardOmnibar
            omnibarRef={omnibarRef}
            horizontalScrollbarSize={horizontalScrollbarSize}
            getPreviousItemId={getPreviousItemId}
            groupByFieldId={groupByFieldId}
            onNewItem={onNewItem}
            omnibarInitialFocus={omnibarInitialFocus}
          />
        )}
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Text {...textProps}>
      {chunks.map(chunk => {
        const textChunk = text.substr(chunk.startIndex, chunk.endIndex - chunk.startIndex)
        return chunk.highlight ? (
          <HighlightedMark key={chunk.startIndex.toString()}>{textChunk}</HighlightedMark>
        ) : (
          textChunk
        )
      })}
    </Text>

usage.text:
<Popover
      open={open}
      caret={position === 'above' ? 'bottom' : 'top'}
      sx={{
        top: position === 'above' ? `-4px` : `calc(100% + 12px)`,
        transform: `translateX(-50%)${position === 'above' ? ' translateY(-100%)' : ''}`,
        // Must use CSS variables to control the caret location because psuedo-elements are not selectable by JS
        ['--caret-offset' as any]: '0',
        width: 'max-content',
        fontSize: 0
      }}
      ref={containerRef}
    >
      <Popover.Content
        as="p"
        aria-live="polite"
        id={id}
        sx={{
          pt: 1,
          pb: 1,
          pr: 2,
          pl: 2,
          // Delegate width control to parent so max-width works
          width: 'auto',
          color: 'fg.onEmphasis',
          borderColor: 'danger.muted',
          backgroundColor: 'danger.emphasis',
          textAlign: 'center',
          '&::before': caretSx,
          '&::after': caretSx
        }}
        {...testIdProps(testId ?? 'validation-error-popover')}
      >
        {message}
      </Popover.Content>
    </Popover>

usage.text:
<Box
      {...testIdProps('base-filter-input')}
      onClick={handleContainerClick}
      ref={containerRef}
      sx={{
        boxShadow: theme => `0 1px 0 ${theme.colors.border.default}, ${theme.shadows.shadow.medium}`,
        display: 'flex',
        flex: 1,
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        maxHeight: `${visible ? height : 0}`,
        maxWidth: '100%',
        pl: 4,
        pr: [3, 4, 5],
        position: 'relative',
        zIndex: `${visible ? '2' : 'unset'}`,
        ':hover': {
          cursor: 'text'
        },
        '&.is-focused': {
          boxShadow: theme => `${theme.shadows.btn.focusShadow}, ${theme.shadows.shadow.medium}`
        },
        '&:focus-within': {
          boxShadow: theme => `${theme.shadows.btn.focusShadow}, ${theme.shadows.shadow.medium}`
        },
        ...containerSx
      }}
    >
      <Box
        sx={{
          alignItems: 'center',
          pr: 7,
          maxWidth: '100%',
          flexShrink: 1,
          display: 'flex',
          minWidth: '20px'
        }}
      >
        <Box
          sx={{
            opacity: visible ? '1' : '0',
            position: 'relative',
            maxHeight: visible ? 'unset' : '0px'
          }}
        >
          <FilterIconButton
            onClick={onFilterIconButtonClick}
            {...testIdProps('filter-visible-icon-button')}
            tabIndex={visible ? 0 : -1}
          />
        </Box>
        <Box
          sx={{
            position: 'relative',
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            zIndex: visible ? 2 : 0,
            opacity: visible ? 1 : 0,
            transition: 'opacity 0.1s ease-out',
            maxWidth: 'calc(100% - 30px)',
            marginRight: '8px',
            marginLeft: '22px',
            marginBottom: '-1px',
            maxHeight: visible ? 'unset' : '0px',
            overflowX: 'auto',
            height: '100%',
            msOverflowStyle: 'none',
            scrollbarWidth: 'none',
            '&::-webkit-scrollbar': {
              display: 'none'
            },
            ...inputContainerSx
          }}
        >
          <TokenizedQuery
            sx={{
              position: 'absolute',
              userSelect: 'none',
              whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
              wordBreak: 'break-word',
              fontSize: 1,
              flex: 1,
              width: '100%',
              padding: '0px',
              opacity: visible ? 1 : 0,
              top: '50%',
              transform: 'translateY(-50%)'
            }}
            query={value}
          />
          <AutosizeTextInput
            role="combobox"
            id="filter-bar-input"
            aria-haspopup="listbox"
            aria-expanded={areFilterSuggestionsVisible}
            aria-autocomplete="list"
            aria-controls={FILTER_INPUT_LIST_ID}
            as={BorderlessTextInput}
            aria-label={Resources.filterByKeyboardOrByField}
            name="Filter"
            value={value}
            onChange={onChange}
            onClick={stopEvent}
            onKeyDown={handleInputKeyDown}
            onFocus={onFocus}
            onBlur={onBlur}
            placeholder={Resources.filterByKeyboardOrByField}
            autoComplete="off"
            autoCorrect="false"
            autoCapitalize="false"
            spellCheck="false"
            {...testIdProps('filter-bar-input')}
            ref={inputRef}
            tabIndex={visible ? 0 : -1}
            containerSx={{
              maxWidth: '100%',
              opacity: visible ? '1' : '0'
            }}
            sx={{
              position: 'relative',
              display: 'flex',
              resize: 'none',
              outline: 'none',
              border: '0px',
              width: '100%',
              padding: '0px',
              background: 'transparent',
              overflow: 'hidden',
              overflowX: 'auto',
              color: 'transparent',
              minWidth: '20px',
              caretColor: (theme: FixMeTheme) => theme.colors.fg.default,
              fontSize: 1,
              flex: 1,
              height: '100%',
              opacity: visible ? 1 : 0,
              maxHeight: visible ? 'unset' : '0px',
              '&::-webkit-autofill, &::-webkit-contacts-auto-fill-button, &::-webkit-credentials-auto-fill-button': {
                visibility: 'hidden',
                display: 'none !important',
                pointerEvents: 'none',
                position: 'absolute',
                right: 0
              }
            }}
          />
        </Box>

        <>
          {typeof filterCount === 'number' ? (
            <CounterLabel
              sx={{
                opacity: visible ? '1' : '0'
              }}
              {...testIdProps('filter-results-count')}
            >
              {filterCount}
            </CounterLabel>
          ) : null}
          {isClearButtonVisible ? (
            <IconButton
              variant="invisible"
              ref={clearButtonRef}
              onClick={handleClearButtonClick}
              onKeyDown={onClearButtonKeyDown}
              icon={XIcon}
              sx={{
                display: 'inline-flex',
                borderRadius: '6px',
                m: 0,
                opacity: visible ? '1' : '0',
                p: '2px',
                position: 'relative',
                color: 'fg.muted'
              }}
              aria-label="Clear filter query"
              {...testIdProps('clear-filter-query')}
            />
          ) : null}
        </>
      </Box>

      {onResetChanges || onSaveChanges ? (
        <Box
          sx={{
            alignItems: 'center',
            height,
            pl: 3,
            display: 'flex'
          }}
          {...testIdProps('filter-state-actions')}
        >
          {onResetChanges ? (
            <IconButton
              variant="invisible"
              icon={ReplyIcon}
              ref={clearButtonRef}
              onClick={handleResetChanges}
              sx={{
                mr: 2,
                color: 'fg.muted',
                pr: '6px',
                pl: '6px',
                fontSize: 1
              }}
              aria-label="Revert"
              // eslint primer-react/no-system-props rule incorrectly wants to merge "size" into system props
              {...{size: 'small'}}
              {...testIdProps('filter-actions-reset-button')}
            />
          ) : null}
          {onSaveChanges ? (
            <Button
              variant="outline"
              size="small"
              sx={{height: '28px'}}
              onClick={handleSaveChanges}
              {...testIdProps('filter-actions-save-button')}
            >
              {Resources.saveChanges}
            </Button>
          ) : null}
        </Box>
      ) : null}
      {visible ? (
        <FilterSuggestions
          testId={FILTER_INPUT_LIST_ID}
          ref={suggestionsListRef}
          filterInputRef={inputRef}
          query={value}
          setQuery={setValueFromSuggestion}
          areFilterSuggestionsVisible={areFilterSuggestionsVisible}
          setAreFilterSuggestionsVisible={setAreFilterSuggestionsVisible}
        />
      ) : null}
    </Box>

            zIndex: visible ? 2 : 0,

            transition: 'opacity 0.1s ease-out',
            maxWidth: 'calc(100% - 30px)',
            marginRight: '8px',
            marginLeft: '22px',
            marginBottom: '-1px',
            maxHeight: visible ? 'unset' : '0px',
            overflowX: 'auto',
            height: '100%',
            msOverflowStyle: 'none',
            scrollbarWidth: 'none',
            '&::-webkit-scrollbar': {
              display: 'none'
            },
            ...inputContainerSx
          }}
        >
          <TokenizedQuery
            sx={{
              position: 'absolute',
              userSelect: 'none',
              whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
              wordBreak: 'break-word',
              fontSize: 1,
              flex: 1,
              width: '100%',
              padding: '0px',
              opacity: visible ? 1 : 0,
              top: '50%',
              transform: 'translateY(-50%)'
            }}
            query={value}
          />
          <AutosizeTextInput
            role="combobox"
            id="filter-bar-input"
            aria-haspopup="listbox"
            aria-expanded={areFilterSuggestionsVisible}
            aria-autocomplete="list"
            aria-controls={FILTER_INPUT_LIST_ID}
            as={BorderlessTextInput}
            aria-label={Resources.filterByKeyboardOrByField}
            name="Filter"
            value={value}
            onChange={onChange}
            onClick={stopEvent}
            onKeyDown={handleInputKeyDown}
            onFocus={onFocus}
            onBlur={onBlur}
            placeholder={Resources.filterByKeyboardOrByField}
            autoComplete="off"
            autoCorrect="false"
            autoCapitalize="false"
            spellCheck="false"
            {...testIdProps('filter-bar-input')}
            ref={inputRef}
            tabIndex={visible ? 0 : -1}
            containerSx={{
              maxWidth: '100%',
              opacity: visible ? '1' : '0'
            }}
            sx={{
              position: 'relative',
              display: 'flex',
              resize: 'none',
              outline: 'none',
              border: '0px',
              width: '100%',
              padding: '0px',
              background: 'transparent',
              overflow: 'hidden',
              overflowX: 'auto',
              color: 'transparent',
              minWidth: '20px',
              caretColor: (theme: FixMeTheme) => theme.colors.fg.default,
              fontSize: 1,
              flex: 1,
              height: '100%',
              opacity: visible ? 1 : 0,
              maxHeight: visible ? 'unset' : '0px',
              '&::-webkit-autofill, &::-webkit-contacts-auto-fill-button, &::-webkit-credentials-auto-fill-button': {
                visibility: 'hidden',
                display: 'none !important',
                pointerEvents: 'none',
                position: 'absolute',
                right: 0
              }
            }}
          />
        </Box>

        <>
          {typeof filterCount === 'number' ? (
            <CounterLabel
              sx={{
                opacity: visible ? '1' : '0'
              }}
              {...testIdProps('filter-results-count')}
            >
              {filterCount}
            </CounterLabel>
          ) : null}
          {isClearButtonVisible ? (
            <IconButton
              variant="invisible"
              ref={clearButtonRef}
              onClick={handleClearButtonClick}
              onKeyDown={onClearButtonKeyDown}
              icon={XIcon}
              sx={{
                display: 'inline-flex',
                borderRadius: '6px',
                m: 0,
                opacity: visible ? '1' : '0',
                p: '2px',
                position: 'relative',
                color: 'fg.muted'
              }}
              aria-label="Clear filter query"
              {...testIdProps('clear-filter-query')}
            />
          ) : null}
        </>
      </Box>

<Box
        {...props}
        ref={containerRef}
        {...testIdProps(`tokenized-query`)}
        aria-errormessage={invalidQuery ? 'tokenized-query-invalid-query-errormessage' : undefined}
      >
        <Spaces length={leadingSpace} />
        {orderedTokenizedFilters.map((token, index) => {
          return (
            <Fragment key={index}>
              <Token {...token} id={`tokenized-query-token-${index}`} invalid={invalidQuery} />
              <Spaces length={token.spaceAfter.length} />
            </Fragment>
          )
        })}
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Box
      id={id}
      ref={keyContainerRef}
      sx={{
        position: 'relative',
        display: 'inline-block',
        ...getErrorStyles({
          invalid: Boolean(invalid || keyErrors)
        })
      }}
    >
      <Text
        sx={{
          display: 'inline-block',
          whiteSpace: 'pre',
          color: (theme: FixMeTheme) => theme.colors.fg.muted
        }}
        aria-errormessage={keyErrors ? `${id}-key-errormessage` : undefined}
      >
        {`${exclude ? '-' : ''}${leftSide}:`}
        {keyErrors ? (
          <ControlledPortalTooltip
            direction="se"
            open={hovering === 'key'}
            aria-label={keyErrors.message}
            ref={keyTooltipRef}
            id={`${id}-key-errormessage`}
            aria-live="polite"
            portalProps={{
              onMount: keyErrorPosition.adjustPickerPosition
            }}
          />
        ) : null}
      </Text>
      <Text
        ref={valueContainerRef}
        sx={{
          position: 'relative',
          display: 'inline-block',
          color: (theme: FixMeTheme) => theme.colors.accent.fg,
          whiteSpace: 'pre',
          ...getErrorStyles({
            invalid: Boolean(valueErrors),
            variant: 'attention'
          })
        }}
        aria-errormessage={valueErrors ? `${id}-value-errormessage` : undefined}
      >
        {rightSide}
        {valueErrors ? (
          <ControlledPortalTooltip
            direction="se"
            open={hovering === 'value'}
            aria-label={valueErrors.message}
            ref={valueTooltipRef}
            id={`${id}-value-errormessage`}
            aria-live="polite"
            portalProps={{
              onMount: valueErrorPosition.adjustPickerPosition
            }}
          />
        ) : null}
      </Text>
    </Box>

<ActionMenu open={menuOpen} onOpenChange={setMenuOpen} anchorRef={menuRef}>

        <IconButton
          icon={TriangleDownIcon}
          onClick={onToggleMenuClick}
          aria-label="Item actions"
          sx={{
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            justifyContent: 'center',
            px: 0,
            py: 0,
            height: 18,
            width: 18
          }}
        />
      </ActionMenu.Anchor>
      <ActionMenu.Overlay portalContainerName="table-portal-root">
        <ActionList>
          {itemHierarchy && (
            <ActionList.Item onSelect={onRemoveItem}>
              <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                <ArchiveIcon />
              </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
              Remove subtask
            </ActionList.Item>
          )}
          {!itemHierarchy && (
            <ActionList.Item variant="danger" onSelect={onDeleteItem}>
              <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                <TrashIcon />
              </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
              Delete from project
            </ActionList.Item>
          )}
        </ActionList>
      </ActionMenu.Overlay>
    </ActionMenu>

            sx={{
              ...(hasWritePermissions
                ? {
                    '&:focus-within': {
                      boxShadow: 'primary.shadow.focus',

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{maxWidth: themeGet('sizes.large'), mx: 'auto', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '24px'}}>
      <Heading
        {...testIdProps('insights-header')}
        as="h2"
        sx={{
          borderBottom: (theme: FixMeTheme) => `1px solid ${theme.colors.border.muted}`,
          fontSize: 4,
          fontWeight: 'normal',
          pb: 2,
          display: 'flex',
          justifyContent: 'space-between'
        }}
      >
        {chartIsDefault ? chart.name : <InsightsChartName chart={chart} />}
        <Box>
          <Button
            leadingIcon={PencilIcon}
            onClick={openPane}
            {...testIdProps('insights-configuration-pane-button-open')}
          >
            Configure
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </Heading>

      {chart.description ? <Text sx={{fontSize: 1}}>{chart.description} </Text> : null}

      <InsightsFilters
        inputRef={inputRef}
        filteredItems={filteredItems}
        filterValue={filterValue}
        handleFilterValueChange={handleFilterValueChange}
        onClearButtonClick={onClearButtonClick}
        setValueFromSuggestion={setValueFromSuggestion}
        onSaveChanges={isUserDefinedChart && dirtyState.isFilterDirty ? handleSaveChanges : undefined}
        onResetChanges={dirtyState.isFilterDirty ? resetFilter : undefined}
      />

      {!isValid ? (
        <InvalidConfigError />
      ) : (
        <>
          {isHistorical ? (
            <Box sx={{display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
              <PeriodNavigation period={period} />
              <InsightCustomDatePicker startDate={startDate} endDate={endDate} />
            </Box>
          ) : null}
          <Box sx={chartContainerStyles}>
            <Box sx={chartBufferStyles}>
              {isHistorical ? (
                <HistoricalInsightsChart
                  chart={chart}
                  isLoading={isLoading}
                  filterValue={filterValue}
                  period={period}
                  startDate={startDate}
                  endDate={endDate}
                  filteredItems={filteredItems}
                />
              ) : (
                <CurrentInsightsChart
                  configuration={chart.localVersion.configuration}
                  isLoading={isLoading}
                  filterValue={filterValue}
                  filteredItems={filteredItems}
                />
              )}

usage.text:
<Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          gap: 0,
          justifyContent: 'space-between',
          backgroundColor: isSelected ? 'accent.subtle' : 'transparent',
          boxShadow: theme =>
            isSelected
              ? `inset 0 1px 0 ${theme.colors.accent.emphasis}, 0 1px 0 ${theme.colors.accent.emphasis}`
              : 'none',
          position: 'relative',
          '&:hover, &:focus': {
            backgroundColor: 'canvas.subtle',
            '& .triangleDown': {opacity: 1},
            '& .dragHandler': {opacity: 1},
            '& .progressItem': {opacity: 1}
          },
          whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
          width: '100%'
        }}
      >
        {new Array(level).fill('').map((cl, index) => (
          <Box
            key={index}
            sx={{
              display: 'flex',
              alignItems: 'flex-start',
              justifyContent: 'flex-end',
              width: PADDING_PER_LEVEL,
              borderRight: '1px solid',
              borderColor: 'border.default',
              mr: 2
            }}
          />
        ))}
        <Box
          sx={{
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            flexGrow: 1,
            pl: 0,
            overflow: 'hidden',
            flexShrink: 1
          }}
        >
          {canExpandHierarchy && (
            <CollapseIcon
              isExpanded={isExpanded}
              onClick={onChildViewToggle}
              isDisabled={item.contentType === ItemType.RedactedItem}
            />
          )}
          <Box
            sx={{
              flexGrow: 1,
              display: 'flex',
              gap: 2,
              ml: canExpandHierarchy ? 0 : 4,
              alignItems: 'center',
              justifyContent: 'flex-start',
              lineHeight: 1,
              overflow: 'hidden'
            }}
          >
            <ItemIcon item={item} />
            <Box
              sx={{
                display: 'flex',
                flexGrow: 1,
                borderBottom: '1px solid',
                borderColor: 'border.muted',
                gap: 2,
                alignItems: 'center',
                justifyContent: 'flex-start',
                overflow: 'hidden',
                pr: 2,
                py: 1
              }}
            >
              <ItemTitle item={item} />
              <ItemLocation item={item} />
              {totalCount > 0 && (
                <Button
                  variant="invisible"
                  className="progressItem"
                  aria-label={`${completedCount} of ${totalCount} completed`}
                  onClick={handleTracksClick}
                  sx={{
                    p: 0,
                    borderRadius: 3,
                    transition: 'opacity 150ms ease-in-out',
                    transitionDelay: '150ms',
                    opacity: totalCount > 0 ? 1 : 0,
                    '&:hover': {backgroundColor: 'transparent'}
                  }}
                >
                  <SubtaskProgress completed={completedCount} total={totalCount} />
                </Button>
              )}
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <Box
          sx={{
            display: 'flex',
            gap: 2,
            alignItems: 'center',
            borderBottom: '1px solid',
            borderColor: 'border.muted',
            pr: 1,
            flexShrink: 0
          }}
        >
          <ItemLabels item={item} allowFiltering={true} />
          <ItemAssignees item={item} />
        </Box>
        <Box
          sx={{
            display: 'flex',
            alignItems: 'center',
            borderBottom: '1px solid',
            borderColor: 'border.muted',
            pr: 2
          }}
        >
          <Box
            ref={contextMenuRef}
            sx={{
              opacity: 0
            }}
            className="triangleDown"
          >
            {hasWritePermissions && <ItemMenu item={item} onRemoveItem={onRemoveItem} menuRef={contextMenuRef} />}
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Box>

          className={omnibarClassName}

            filteredItemIds={filteredItemIds}
            showDiscoveryMenu={showDiscoveryMenu}
            setShowDiscoveryMenu={setShowDiscoveryMenu}
            onAddItem={onAddItem}
            onAddDraftItem={onAddDraftItem}

usage.name: Box
AnchoredOverlay

props.name: overlayProps

usage.text:
<AnchoredOverlay
      anchorRef={anchorRef}
      renderAnchor={null}
      open={isOpen}
      onClose={closeModal}
      width="medium"
      overlayProps={{
        ...testIdProps('add-column-menu'),
        initialFocusRef: textInputRef,
        sx: maxOverlayHeight
          ? {maxHeight: maxOverlayHeight, overflowY: 'auto', overflowX: 'visible'}
          : {overflow: 'visible'}
      }}
      focusZoneSettings={{bindKeys: FocusKeys.Tab}}
    >
      <ActionList ref={selectMenuListRef} {...drop.props} sx={{cursor: 'default', pb: 0}}>
        <Box sx={{p: 3, pb: 0, mb: 2, position: 'relative'}}>
          <form onSubmit={e => e.preventDefault()}>
            <FormControl id="add-column-name-input">
              <FormControl.Label visuallyHidden>Column name</FormControl.Label>
              {/* id and aria-describedby must be provided to the input, as the FormControl does not propagate this for our EmojiPicker wrapped input */}
              <EmojiPicker sx={{width: '100%'}}>
                <TextInput
                  id="add-column-name-input"
                  {...inputCompositionProps}
                  onFocus={handleFocus}
                  value={title}
                  className={isTitleValid ? '' : 'error'}
                  onChange={handleTitleChange}
                  ref={textInputRef}
                  // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/no-autofocus
                  autoFocus
                  aria-invalid={!isTitleValid}
                  {...testIdProps('add-column-name-input')}
                  aria-describedby="add-column-name-input-invalid"
                  validationStatus={!isTitleValid ? 'error' : undefined}
                />
              </EmojiPicker>
              {!isTitleValid && (
                <FormControl.Validation id="add-column-name-input-invalid" variant="error">
                  {validationMessage}
                </FormControl.Validation>
              )}
            </FormControl>
          </form>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{px: 3}}>
          <ActionMenu>
            <ActionMenu.Button
              sx={{
                width: '100%',
                pr: 2,
                mb: 2,
                gridTemplateColumns: 'min-content 1fr min-content',
                '[data-component=text]': {textAlign: 'left'}
              }}
              {...testIdProps('add-column-type')}
            >
              <Box sx={{flexGrow: 1, alignItems: 'center', display: 'flex'}}>
                <Box>
                  <StyledOcticon icon={SelectedIcon} sx={{mr: 1, color: 'fg.muted'}} />
                </Box>
                <Box>{dropdownSelection.text}</Box>
              </Box>
            </ActionMenu.Button>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay>
              <ActionList selectionVariant="single">
                {items.map((item, index) => (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    key={index}
                    selected={dropdownSelection === item}
                    onSelect={() => onDropdownChange(item)}
                    {...item}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <item.leadingVisual />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    {item.text}
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ))}
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>
        </Box>
        {selectedColumn === MemexColumnDataType.SingleSelect && (
          <Box sx={{px: 3, pt: 2, flexWrap: 'wrap'}}>
            <StyledOptionText>Options</StyledOptionText>
            <SingleSelectForm
              options={options}
              canRemoveOption={canRemoveOption}
              addOption={addOption}
              updateOption={updateOption}
              removeOption={removeOption}
              renderTextInput={(_option, index, props) => (
                <EmojiPicker sx={{width: '100%'}}>
                  <TextInput
                    aria-label="New option name"
                    // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/no-autofocus
                    autoFocus
                    placeholder={`Option ${index + 1}`}
                    {...props}
                  />
                </EmojiPicker>
              )}
            />
          </Box>
        )}
        {selectedColumn === MemexColumnDataType.Iteration && (
          <Box sx={{px: 3, pt: 2, flexWrap: 'wrap'}}>
            <StyledOptionText>Options</StyledOptionText>
            <NewIterationOptions
              duration={iterationDuration}
              onDurationChange={setIterationDuration}
              onValidChange={setIsIterationOptionsValid}
              startDate={iterationStartDate}
              onStartDateChange={setIterationStartDate}
              minStartDate={minIterationStartDate}
            />
          </Box>
        )}
        <Box
          sx={{
            justifyContent: 'flex-end',
            px: 3,
            py: 2,
            mt: 4,
            borderTop: '1px solid',
            borderColor: 'border.muted',
            display: 'flex',
            backgroundColor: theme => `${theme.colors.canvas.default}`
          }}
        >
          <Button {...defaultButtonProps} onClick={closeModal}>
            Cancel
          </Button>
          <Button
            variant="primary"
            {...testIdProps('add-column-modal-save')}
            {...defaultButtonProps}
            onClick={saveNewColumn}
            disabled={!isColumnValid || !isIterationOptionsValid}
            sx={{ml: 1}}
          >
            {saveText}
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </ActionList>
    </AnchoredOverlay>

usage.name: ActionList
usage.text:
<ActionList ref={selectMenuListRef} {...drop.props} sx={{cursor: 'default', pb: 0}}>
        <Box sx={{p: 3, pb: 0, mb: 2, position: 'relative'}}>
          <form onSubmit={e => e.preventDefault()}>
            <FormControl id="add-column-name-input">
              <FormControl.Label visuallyHidden>Column name</FormControl.Label>
              {/* id and aria-describedby must be provided to the input, as the FormControl does not propagate this for our EmojiPicker wrapped input */}
              <EmojiPicker sx={{width: '100%'}}>
                <TextInput
                  id="add-column-name-input"
                  {...inputCompositionProps}
                  onFocus={handleFocus}
                  value={title}
                  className={isTitleValid ? '' : 'error'}
                  onChange={handleTitleChange}
                  ref={textInputRef}
                  // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/no-autofocus
                  autoFocus
                  aria-invalid={!isTitleValid}
                  {...testIdProps('add-column-name-input')}
                  aria-describedby="add-column-name-input-invalid"
                  validationStatus={!isTitleValid ? 'error' : undefined}
                />
              </EmojiPicker>
              {!isTitleValid && (
                <FormControl.Validation id="add-column-name-input-invalid" variant="error">
                  {validationMessage}
                </FormControl.Validation>
              )}
            </FormControl>
          </form>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{px: 3}}>
          <ActionMenu>
            <ActionMenu.Button
              sx={{
                width: '100%',
                pr: 2,
                mb: 2,
                gridTemplateColumns: 'min-content 1fr min-content',
                '[data-component=text]': {textAlign: 'left'}
              }}
              {...testIdProps('add-column-type')}
            >
              <Box sx={{flexGrow: 1, alignItems: 'center', display: 'flex'}}>
                <Box>
                  <StyledOcticon icon={SelectedIcon} sx={{mr: 1, color: 'fg.muted'}} />
                </Box>
                <Box>{dropdownSelection.text}</Box>
              </Box>
            </ActionMenu.Button>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay>
              <ActionList selectionVariant="single">
                {items.map((item, index) => (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    key={index}
                    selected={dropdownSelection === item}
                    onSelect={() => onDropdownChange(item)}
                    {...item}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <item.leadingVisual />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    {item.text}
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ))}
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>
        </Box>
        {selectedColumn === MemexColumnDataType.SingleSelect && (
          <Box sx={{px: 3, pt: 2, flexWrap: 'wrap'}}>
            <StyledOptionText>Options</StyledOptionText>
            <SingleSelectForm
              options={options}
              canRemoveOption={canRemoveOption}
              addOption={addOption}
              updateOption={updateOption}
              removeOption={removeOption}
              renderTextInput={(_option, index, props) => (
                <EmojiPicker sx={{width: '100%'}}>
                  <TextInput
                    aria-label="New option name"
                    // eslint-disable-next-line jsx-a11y/no-autofocus
                    autoFocus
                    placeholder={`Option ${index + 1}`}
                    {...props}
                  />
                </EmojiPicker>
              )}
            />
          </Box>
        )}
        {selectedColumn === MemexColumnDataType.Iteration && (
          <Box sx={{px: 3, pt: 2, flexWrap: 'wrap'}}>
            <StyledOptionText>Options</StyledOptionText>
            <NewIterationOptions
              duration={iterationDuration}
              onDurationChange={setIterationDuration}
              onValidChange={setIsIterationOptionsValid}
              startDate={iterationStartDate}
              onStartDateChange={setIterationStartDate}
              minStartDate={minIterationStartDate}
            />
          </Box>
        )}
        <Box
          sx={{
            justifyContent: 'flex-end',
            px: 3,
            py: 2,
            mt: 4,
            borderTop: '1px solid',
            borderColor: 'border.muted',
            display: 'flex',
            backgroundColor: theme => `${theme.colors.canvas.default}`
          }}
        >
          <Button {...defaultButtonProps} onClick={closeModal}>
            Cancel
          </Button>
          <Button
            variant="primary"
            {...testIdProps('add-column-modal-save')}
            {...defaultButtonProps}
            onClick={saveNewColumn}
            disabled={!isColumnValid || !isIterationOptionsValid}
            sx={{ml: 1}}
          >
            {saveText}
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </ActionList>

<Box

        width: '100%',
        cursor: 'text',
        display: 'flex',
        position: 'relative'
      }}

        inputHasFocus={inputHasFocus}
        value={inputRef.current?.value}
        placeholder={defaultPlaceholder}
      />
      {input}
      <RepoList
        {...getListProps()}
        inputRef={inputRef}
        aria-label={placeholder}
        isOpen={isOpen}
        loading={refreshing}
        positionDataMap={positionDataMap}
        getItemProps={getItemProps}
        repositories={searchResults || []}
      />
    </Box>

usage.name: ActionMenu
usage.text:
<ActionMenu open={menuOpen} onOpenChange={setMenuState}>
            <ActionMenu.Anchor>
              <RowMenuButton
                icon={TriangleDownIcon}
                aria-label="Row actions"
                className="menu-trigger"
                tabIndex={-1}
                {...testIdProps('row-menu-trigger')}
              />
            </ActionMenu.Anchor>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay portalContainerName="table-portal-root" {...testIdProps('row-menu')}>
              <ActionList>
                {!multipleSelected && contentType === ItemType.DraftIssue ? (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    onSelect={() => setRepoPickerOpen(true)}
                    {...testIdProps('row-menu-convert-to-issue')}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <IssueOpenedIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    Convert to issue
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ) : null}

                {isArchivable ? (
                  <>
                    {multipleSelected ? (
                      <ActionList.Item onSelect={archiveMultipleOnClick} {...testIdProps('row-menu-archive-multiple')}>
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <ArchiveIcon />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        Archive {selectedRows.length} items
                        <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                          <EKey />
                        </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    ) : (
                      <ActionList.Item onSelect={archiveOnClick} {...testIdProps('row-menu-archive')}>
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <ArchiveIcon />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        Archive
                        <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                          <EKey />
                        </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    )}
                  </>
                ) : null}

                {multipleSelected ? (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    variant="danger"
                    onSelect={deleteMultipleOnClick}
                    {...testIdProps('row-menu-delete-multiple')}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <TrashIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    Delete {selectedRows.length} selected items from project
                    <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      <DelKey />
                    </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ) : (
                  <ActionList.Item variant="danger" onSelect={deleteOnClick} {...testIdProps('row-menu-delete')}>
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <TrashIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    Delete from project
                    <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      <DelKey />
                    </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                  </ActionList.Item>
                )}
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box
      role="table"
      sx={{flexDirection: 'column', flex: 1, display: 'flex'}}
      {...testIdProps(`column-settings-${column.name}`)}
    >
      <Heading
        as="h2"
        sx={{
          borderBottom: (theme: FixMeTheme) => `1px solid ${theme.colors.border.muted}`,
          fontSize: 4,
          fontWeight: 'normal',
          pb: 2,
          mb: 2,
          display: 'flex',
          justifyContent: 'space-between'
        }}
      >
        {column.name} field settings
        {column.userDefined ? (
          <DeleteField
            column={column}
            numberOfColumns={userEditableColumns.length}
            onDeleteColumn={() => {
              const index = userEditableColumns.findIndex(col => col.id === column.id)

              navigate(
                PROJECT_SETTINGS_FIELD_ROUTE.generatePath({
                  projectNumber,
                  fieldId: userEditableColumns[Math.max(0, index - 1)].id
                }),
                {replace: true}
              )
            }}
          />
        ) : null}
      </Heading>
      <Box sx={{pb: 2, mb: 2}}>
        <FieldTitle>Field name</FieldTitle>
        {column.userDefined ? (
          <>
            <Box sx={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', display: 'flex'}}>
              <EmojiPicker sx={{display: 'block', width: WIDTH, flex: `0 1 ${WIDTH}px`}}>
                <TextInput
                  block
                  key={column.id}
                  value={localValue}
                  ref={inputRef}
                  {...inputProps}
                  sx={{...additionalStyle}}
                  {...testIdProps('change-column-name-input')}
                />
              </EmojiPicker>
              {isSuccess && <SuccessState />}
              {isError && <ErrorState caret="top-left" message={getErrorMessage()} />}
            </Box>
          </>
        ) : (
          <>
            <Box sx={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', mb: 2, display: 'flex'}}>
              <TextInput disabled sx={{flex: `0 1 ${WIDTH}px`, ...additionalStyle}} value={column.name} />
            </Box>
            <Text sx={{fontSize: 0, color: 'fg.muted'}}>
              {column.name} fields are created by GitHub and cannot be renamed.
            </Text>
          </>
        )}
      </Box>
      <Box>
        <FieldTitle>Field type</FieldTitle>
        <Button leadingIcon={Icon} disabled>
          {getColumnText(column.dataType)}
        </Button>
      </Box>
      <ConfigurationOptions column={column} />
    </Box>

usage.name: Dialog
usage.text:
<Dialog
      title={SettingsResources.deleteProjectTitle}
      width="large"
      renderBody={SingleConfirmBody}
      renderHeader={CloseHeaderWithAlert}
      onClose={onClose}
      role="alertdialog"
    >
      <Text as="p">
        This action <BoldText>cannot</BoldText> be undone. This will permanently delete the{' '}
        <BoldText>{projectName}</BoldText> project, saved views, custom fields and associated values, and Insights data.
      </Text>
      {draftIssueCount ? (
        <Text as="p">
          This will also delete{' '}
          <BoldText>
            {draftIssueCount} draft issue{draftIssueCount > 1 ? 's' : ''}
          </BoldText>{' '}
          that {draftIssueCount > 1 ? 'were' : 'was'} created in this project.
        </Text>
      ) : null}
      <Text as="p">This will not delete issues or pull requests themselves.</Text>
      <Text as="p">
        Please type <BoldText>{projectName}</BoldText> to confirm.
      </Text>

      <form onSubmit={onConfirm} {...testIdProps('confirm-delete-form')}>
        <TextInput
          aria-label={SettingsResources.deleteProjectInputLabel}
          ref={inputRef}
          block
          onChange={(e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => setInputValue(e.target.value)}
          value={inputValue}
          sx={{mb: 3}}
          {...testIdProps('confirm-delete-input')}
        />

        <Dialog.Buttons
          buttons={[
            {
              content: SettingsResources.deleteProjectConfirmation,
              buttonType: 'danger',
              disabled: inputValue !== projectName,
              type: 'submit',
              sx: {width: '100%'}
            }
          ]}
        />
      </form>
    </Dialog>

                      sx={{position: 'relative', ml: '16px', px: 3}}
                      onClick={resetNetworkCall}
                      aria-describedby="visibilityHeading"
                      leadingIcon={isPublicProject ? GlobeIcon : LockIcon}
                    >
                      {isPublicProject ? 'Public' : 'Private'}
                    </ActionMenu.Button>
                    <ActionMenu.Overlay anchorSide="inside-right">
                      <ActionList selectionVariant="single">
                        <ActionList.Item
                          key="private"
                          onSelect={() => onMemexPublic(false)}
                          selected={!isPublicProject}
                          sx={{alignItems: 'flex-start'}}
                        >
                          Private
                          <ActionList.Description variant="block">
                            You choose who can read, write, and admin this project.
                          </ActionList.Description>
                        </ActionList.Item>
                        <ActionList.Item
                          key="public"
                          onSelect={() => onMemexPublic(true)}
                          selected={isPublicProject}
                          sx={{alignItems: 'flex-start'}}
                        >
                          Public
                          <ActionList.Description variant="block">
                            Everyone on the internet has read access to this project. You choose who has write and admin
                            access.
                          </ActionList.Description>
                        </ActionList.Item>
                      </ActionList>
                    </ActionMenu.Overlay>
                  </ActionMenu>

usage.text:
<Box
        sx={{
          width: '100%',
          borderRadius: '6px',
          border: (theme: FixMeTheme) => `1px solid ${theme.colors.border.default}`,
          overflow: 'hidden',
          position: 'relative',
          mt: 4
        }}
      >
        <IterationsHeader
          configuration={localConfiguration}
          selectedTab={selectedTab}
          setSelectedTab={setSelectedTab}
          addButtonProps={{minimumStartDate, defaultDuration, onCreate: handleCreateIteration}}
          disabled={hasUnsavedChanges}
        />

        {rows.length > 0 ? rows : <NoIterationsPlaceholder isActiveTab={isActiveTab} />}

        {selectedTab === 'completed' && countPushedActiveIterations > 0 && (
          <Flash sx={{border: 'none', borderRadius: 0}} {...testIdProps('active-changes-notice')}>
            {SettingsResources.willPushActiveIterations(countPushedActiveIterations)}
          </Flash>
        )}
      </Box>

          gap: 2,

          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center'

          variant="primary"
          disabled={!hasUnsavedChanges || requestStatus === 'loading'}
          onClick={() => saveChanges()}
          {...testIdProps('iteration-field-settings-save')}
        >
          {Resources.saveChanges}
        </Button>
        <Button
          disabled={!hasUnsavedChanges || requestStatus === 'loading'}
          onClick={() => setLocalConfiguration(serverConfiguration)}
          {...testIdProps('iteration-field-settings-reset')}
        >

        <Box sx={{pl: 1}}>
          <RequestStateIcon status={requestStatus} />
          {requestStatus === 'succeeded' ? (
            <ColumnSettingsSavedMessage />
          ) : requestStatus === 'failed' ? (
            <Text sx={{ml: 2}}>{Resources.genericErrorMessage}</Text>
          ) : null}
        </Box>
      </Box>

usage.name: ActionList
usage.text:
<ActionList sx={{pt: 1, pb: 0}} {...testIdProps('settings-side-nav')}>
        <NavLinkActionListItem
          end
          to={PROJECT_SETTINGS_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber})}
          {...testIdProps('general-settings-item')}
          onClick={(e: React.MouseEvent) => {
            postStats({
              name: SettingsOpen,
              ui: SettingsOpenSidebarUI,
              context: `${e.type}: ${e.currentTarget.tagName}`
            })
          }}
        >
          <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
            <GearIcon />
          </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
          Project settings
        </NavLinkActionListItem>
        {hasAdminPermissions && (
          <NavLinkActionListItem
            to={PROJECT_SETTINGS_ACCESS_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber})}
            {...testIdProps('manage-access-item')}
          >
            Manage access
          </NavLinkActionListItem>
        )}
        <ActionList.Divider />
        <ActionList.Group
          aria-label="Custom fields"
          sx={{mr: 0}}
          title={
            (
              <Box sx={{display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center'}}>
                Custom fields
                <Button
                  ref={anchorRef}
                  variant="invisible"
                  size="small"
                  aria-label="Add new field"
                  sx={{color: 'accent.fg', mr: -3}}
                  leadingIcon={PlusIcon}
                  onClick={() => setShow(s => !s)}
                >
                  New field
                </Button>
              </Box>
            ) as any // until primer has better support to allow this in types
          }
        >
          {useMemo(
            () =>
              allColumns
                .filter(column => {
                  return isColumnUserEditable(column)
                })
                .map(col => {
                  const Icon = getColumnIcon(col.dataType)
                  return (
                    <NavLinkActionListItem
                      key={col.id}
                      to={{
                        pathname: PROJECT_SETTINGS_FIELD_ROUTE.generatePath({
                          projectNumber,
                          fieldId: encodeURIComponent(col.id)
                        })
                      }}
                      onClick={(e: React.MouseEvent) => {
                        postStats({
                          name: SettingsOpenField,
                          ui: SettingsOpenSidebarUI,
                          memexProjectColumnId: col.id,
                          context: `${e.type}: ${e.currentTarget.tagName}`
                        })
                      }}
                      {...testIdProps(`ColumnSettingsItem{id: ${col.name}}`)}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <Icon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>

                      {col.name}
                    </NavLinkActionListItem>
                  )
                }),
            [allColumns, postStats, projectNumber]
          )}
        </ActionList.Group>
      </ActionList>

usage.name: ActionList
usage.text:
<ActionList
    selectionVariant="single"
    role="listbox"
    aria-roledescription="update issue state options menu"
    sx={{
      display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column'
    }}
  >
    {issueState === IssueState.Open && (
      <ActionList.Item
        key={'close-issue-option'}
        onSelect={() => setButtonState('open')}
        selected={buttonState === 'open'}
        disabled={!canClose}
      >
        <ActionList.LeadingVisual sx={{color: 'done.fg'}}>
          <IssueClosedIcon />
        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
        Close as completed
        <ActionList.Description variant="block">Done, closed, fixed, resolved</ActionList.Description>
      </ActionList.Item>
    )}
    {issueState === IssueState.Closed && (
      <ActionList.Item
        key={'reopen-issue-option'}
        onSelect={() => setButtonState('closed')}
        selected={buttonState === 'closed'}
        disabled={!canReopen}
      >
        <ActionList.LeadingVisual sx={{color: 'open.fg'}}>
          <IssueReopenedIcon />
        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
        Reopen issue
      </ActionList.Item>
    )}
    <ActionList.Item
      key={'skip-issue-option'}
      onSelect={() => setButtonState('skip')}
      selected={buttonState === 'skip'}
      disabled={!canClose}
    >
      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
        <SkipIcon />
      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
      Close as not planned
      <ActionList.Description variant="block">
        Won't fix, can't repro, duplicate, stale
      </ActionList.Description>
    </ActionList.Item>
  </ActionList>

<Box sx={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: 2}}>
      {(onClose || onReopen) && (
        <ButtonGroup sx={{display: 'flex'}}>
          <UpdateStateButton hasComment={!isCommentEmpty} state={buttonState} onClose={onClose} onReopen={onReopen} />

          {issues_close_state && (
            <ActionMenu open={closeMenuOpen} onOpenChange={setCloseMenuOpen}>
              <ActionMenu.Anchor>
                <IconButton size="small" icon={TriangleDownIcon} aria-label="More options" />
              </ActionMenu.Anchor>

              <ActionMenu.Overlay>
                <UpdateStateButtonOptions
                  buttonState={buttonState}
                  setButtonState={setButtonState}
                  canClose={onClose !== undefined}
                  canReopen={onReopen !== undefined}
                  issueState={currentIssueState}
                />
              </ActionMenu.Overlay>
            </ActionMenu>
          )}
        </ButtonGroup>
      )}
      <Button
        variant="primary"
        size="small"
        disabled={isCommentEmpty}
        onClick={onAddComent}
        {...testIdProps(`add-comment-button`)}
      >
        Comment
      </Button>
    </Box>

usage.text:
<Box sx={{display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 2}} as="header">
    {author.avatarUrl && (
      <Avatar
        size={24}
        key={author.id}
        alt="" // alt text not needed since we have the username right next to it
        src={author.avatarUrl}
        {...testIdProps('author-avatar')}
      />
    )}

    <Text sx={{fontWeight: 600, fontStyle: 'normal'}} {...testIdProps('author-login')} as="address">
      {author.login}
    </Text>

    {url ? (
      <Link href={url} target="_blank" {...testIdProps('edit-timestamp-link')}>
        <Timestamp createdAt={createdAt} editedAt={editedAt} />
      </Link>
    ) : (
      <Timestamp createdAt={createdAt} editedAt={editedAt} />
    )}

    {authorAssociation && authorAssociation !== CommentAuthorAssociation.NONE && (
      <>
        <Text sx={{color: 'fg.muted'}}>·</Text>
        <Label sx={{fontWeight: 600, alignSelf: 'center'}} {...testIdProps('author-association')}>
          {toTitleCase(authorAssociation)}
        </Label>
      </>
    )}

    <Box sx={{flex: 1}} />

    <Actions url={url} onEdit={onStartEdit} />
  </Box>

        <Box sx={{display: 'flex', mb: 2}}>

            <ItemStateLabel item={item} overrideState={sidePanelMetadata.state} />
            {isLoading ? (
              'Loading...'
            ) : createdAt && login ? (
              <Text sx={{fontSize: 1, fontStyle: 'normal'}} as="address">
                <Text sx={{fontWeight: 'bold'}}>{login}</Text>

              sx={{color: 'fg.muted', mr: -2, mt: -1}}
              icon={XIcon}
              onClick={() => closePane()}
              {...testIdProps('side-panel-button-close')}
            />

usage.text:
<Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          justifyContent: 'space-between',
          alignItems: 'flex-start',
          gap: 2,
          pt: isEditing ? 1 : 0,
          mb: isEditing ? 1 : 0
        }}
      >
        <Box
          sx={{
            flexGrow: 1
          }}
          {...testIdProps('side-panel-title')}
        >
          {isEditing ? (
            <EmojiPicker sx={{width: '100%'}}>
              <TextInput
                aria-label="Item title"
                sx={{lineHeight: '18px'}}
                ref={inputRef as React.RefObject<HTMLInputElement>}
                value={editingTitle}
                onChange={onChange}
                {...inputCompositionProps}
                size="small"
                {...testIdProps('side-panel-title-input')}
              />
            </EmojiPicker>
          ) : (
            <>
              <Text
                sx={{
                  fontSize: 4,
                  fontWeight: 'bold',
                  color: 'fg.default',
                  mr: 2,
                  maxWidth: '100%',
                  cursor: 'default',
                  display: 'inline',
                  wordBreak: 'break-word'
                }}
                as="h2"
                {...testIdProps('side-panel-title-content')}
              >
                <SanitizedHtmlSpan>{title.html}</SanitizedHtmlSpan>
              </Text>
              <ItemNumberLink item={item} />
            </>
          )}
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{mt: isEditing ? 0 : 1}}>
          {!isEditing && !isLoading && canEditTitle && (
            <Button
              size="small"
              onClick={onClick}
              {...testIdProps('side-panel-title-edit-button')}
              aria-label="Edit title"
            >
              Edit
            </Button>
          )}
          {isEditing && (
            <Box sx={{display: 'flex', gap: 2}}>
              <Button
                size="small"
                variant="primary"
                onClick={stopEditingAndSave}
                {...testIdProps('side-panel-title-save-button')}
              >
                Save
              </Button>
              <Button
                size="small"
                onClick={() => {
                  setEditingTitleFromItem()
                  setIsEditing(false)
                }}
                {...testIdProps('side-panel-title-revert-button')}
              >
                Cancel
              </Button>
            </Box>
          )}
        </Box>
      </Box>
