props.name: sx

usage.text:
<Box
      sx={{
        display: 'flex',
        gap: 0,
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        backgroundColor: isSelected ? 'accent.subtle' : 'transparent',
        boxShadow: theme =>
          isSelected
            ? `inset 0 1px 0 ${theme.colors.accent.emphasis}, 0 1px 0 ${theme.colors.accent.emphasis}`
            : 'none',
        position: 'relative',
        '&:hover, &:focus': {
          backgroundColor: 'canvas.subtle',
          '& .triangleDown': {opacity: 1},
          '& .dragHandler': {opacity: 1},
          '& .progressItem': {opacity: 1}
        },
        whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
        width: '100%'
      }}
    >
      <Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          flexGrow: 1,
          pl: 0,
          overflow: 'hidden',
          flexShrink: 1
        }}
      >
        <Box
          sx={{
            flexGrow: 1,
            display: 'flex',
            gap: 2,
            ml: 24,
            alignItems: 'center',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            lineHeight: 1,
            overflow: 'hidden'
          }}
        >
          <ItemIcon item={item} />
          <Box
            sx={{
              display: 'flex',
              flexGrow: 1,
              borderBottom: '1px solid',
              borderColor: 'border.muted',
              gap: 2,
              alignItems: 'center',
              justifyContent: 'flex-start',
              overflow: 'hidden',
              pr: 2,
              py: 1
            }}
          >
            <ItemTitle item={item} />
            <ItemLocation item={item} />
            {totalCount > 0 && (
              <Button
                variant="invisible"
                className="progressItem"
                aria-label={`${completedCount} of ${totalCount} completed`}
                onClick={handleClick}
                sx={{
                  p: 0,
                  borderRadius: 3,
                  transition: 'opacity 150ms ease-in-out',
                  transitionDelay: '150ms',
                  opacity: totalCount > 0 ? 1 : 0,
                  '&:hover': {backgroundColor: 'transparent'}
                }}
              >
                <SubtaskProgress completed={completedCount} total={totalCount} />
              </Button>
            )}
          </Box>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      <Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          gap: 2,
          alignItems: 'center',
          borderBottom: '1px solid',
          borderColor: 'border.muted',
          pr: 1,
          flexShrink: 0
        }}
      >
        <ItemLabels item={item} allowFiltering={false} />
        <ItemAssignees item={item} />
      </Box>
      <Box
        sx={{
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          borderBottom: '1px solid',
          borderColor: 'border.muted'
        }}
      >
        <Box
          ref={contextMenuRef}
          sx={{
            opacity: 0,
            pr: 1
          }}
          className="triangleDown"
        >

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={ulStyles} {...testIdProps('side-panel-suggested-items')}>
      {loading ? (
        <Loader />
      ) : items?.length === 0 && finishedFetchingRepoItems && selectedRepo ? (
        <NoSuggestedItems hasSearchInput={false} />
      ) : selectedRepo ? (
        <Box>
          <Box
            {...testIdProps('side-panel-suggested-items-header')}
            sx={{borderBottom: '1px solid', borderColor: 'border.default', paddingBottom: 2, paddingTop: 3}}
          >
            <Box as="label" sx={{pl: 1, pr: '10px'}} {...testIdProps('selection-all-items')}>
              <Checkbox
                sx={{alignSelf: 'start'}}
                aria-labelledby="select-all-items"
                checked={areAllItemsSelected}
                onChange={selectAllItems}
              />
            </Box>
            <Text>
              {items?.length} most recent {items?.length === 1 ? 'item' : 'items'}
            </Text>
          </Box>
          <Box as="ul">
            {items?.map(suggestedItem => {
              const repoName = selectedRepo.nameWithOwner
              return (
                <SuggestedItem
                  item={suggestedItem}
                  // key is a reserved name in react and thus it is not passing this prop further
                  // so we need a key for this render method and a keyName to pass it down to the children
                  key={`${selectedRepo.nameWithOwner}-${suggestedItem.number}`}
                  keyName={`${selectedRepo.nameWithOwner}-${suggestedItem.number}`}
                  repoName={repoName}
                  url={
                    suggestedItem.type === ItemType.PullRequest
                      ? `/${repoName}/pull/${suggestedItem.number}`
                      : `/${repoName}/issues/${suggestedItem.number}`
                  }
                />
              )
            })}
          </Box>
          <Text
            {...testIdProps('side-panel-suggested-items-footer')}
            sx={{color: 'fg.muted', display: 'block', textAlign: 'center', paddingTop: 4, paddingBottom: 4}}
          >
            showing {items?.length} most recent {items?.length === 1 ? 'item' : 'items'}. Use search to find any item in{' '}
            {selectedRepo.nameWithOwner}
          </Text>
        </Box>
      ) : (
        <NoSuggestedRepos owner={owner} isOrganization={isOrganization} />
      )}
    </Box>

      {reactionEntries.map(([reaction, reactedUsers]) => (
        <ReactionButton
          reaction={reaction}
          reactedUsers={reactedUsers}

          onClick={() => onReact(reaction)}
          disabled={disabled}
        />
      ))}

usage.name: AnchoredOverlay

props.name: renderAnchor

usage.text:
<AnchoredOverlay
      open={isOpen}
      onOpen={() => setOpen(true)}
      onClose={() => setOpen(false)}
      anchorRef={containerRef}
      focusZoneSettings={{
        bindKeys: FocusKeys.ArrowAll | FocusKeys.HomeAndEnd,
        focusOutBehavior: 'wrap'
      }}
      renderAnchor={p => (
        <IconButton
          size="small"
          sx={{
            borderRadius: '50%',
            height: 28,
            width: 28,
            '& > span': {
              ml: '-1px'
            }
          }}
          icon={SmileyIcon}
          aria-label="All reactions"
          {...testIdProps('all-reactions-button')}
          {...p}
        />
      )}
    >
      <ActionList
        sx={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', p: 1, gap: 1}}
        role="menu"
        aria-orientation="horizontal"
        {...testIdProps('reactions-overlay')}
      >
        {Object.values(ReactionEmotion).map(emotion => (
          <ActionList.Item
            key={emotion}
            sx={{
              '&:hover': {
                backgroundColor: 'accent.emphasis'
              },
              py: 1,
              px: 2,
              m: 0,
              backgroundColor: reactedReactions.has(emotion) ? 'accent.subtle' : 'transparent'
            }}
            role="menuitemcheckbox"
            aria-checked={reactedReactions.has(emotion)}
            onClick={() => react(emotion)}
            onKeyDown={e => {
              if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') {
                e.stopPropagation()
                react(emotion)
              }
            }}
            {...testIdProps(`all-reactions-${emotion}-reaction-button`)}
          >
            {getReactionEmoji(emotion)}
          </ActionList.Item>
        ))}
      </ActionList>
    </AnchoredOverlay>

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<ActionList.Item
            key={emotion}
            sx={{
              '&:hover': {
                backgroundColor: 'accent.emphasis'
              },
              py: 1,
              px: 2,
              m: 0,
              backgroundColor: reactedReactions.has(emotion) ? 'accent.subtle' : 'transparent'
            }}
            role="menuitemcheckbox"
            aria-checked={reactedReactions.has(emotion)}
            onClick={() => react(emotion)}
            onKeyDown={e => {
              if (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ') {
                e.stopPropagation()
                react(emotion)
              }
            }}
            {...testIdProps(`all-reactions-${emotion}-reaction-button`)}
          >
            {getReactionEmoji(emotion)}
          </ActionList.Item>

usage.name: Tooltip
usage.text:
<Tooltip
      aria-label={summarizeReactions(reactedUsers)}
      role="presentation"
      sx={{maxWidth: '100%'}}
      wrap={true}
      direction="ne"
      align="left"
    >
      <Button
        size="small"
        sx={{
          '&:hover:not([disabled])': {
            backgroundColor: 'accent.muted'
          },
          backgroundColor: reacted ? 'accent.subtle' : 'transparent',
          borderColor: reacted ? `accent.emphasis` : 'border.default',
          borderRadius: 20,
          px: 2,
          shadow: 'none'
        }}
        aria-label={label}
        role="switch"
        aria-checked={reacted}
        leadingIcon={() => getReactionEmoji(reaction)}
        {...testIdProps(`${reaction}-reaction-button`)}
        onClick={onClick}
        disabled={disabled}
      >
        {reactedUsers.length}
      </Button>
    </Tooltip>

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<Box
        sx={{
          flexShrink: 0,
          width: '100%',
          backgroundColor: 'canvas.inset',
          borderLeft: '1px solid',
          borderLeftColor: 'border.muted',
          height: '100%'
        }}
      >
        <Box sx={{display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', px: 2, py: 2}}>
          <Box sx={{display: 'flex', gap: 1, width: '100%', overflow: 'hidden'}}>
            <Button
              size="small"
              variant="invisible"
              sx={{
                color: 'fg.muted',
                px: 2,
                fontWeight: 'normal',
                flex: 1,
                display: 'flex',
                alignItems: 'center',
                overflow: 'hidden',
                '[data-component="text"]': {
                  textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
                  overflow: 'hidden'
                }
              }}
              onClick={() => (ancestors.length > 0 ? onClickAncestor(ancestors.length - 1) : onClosePane())}
              leadingIcon={ArrowLeftIcon}
              title={ancestors[ancestors.length - 1].item.getTitle()}
            >
              {ancestors[ancestors.length - 1].item.getTitle()}
            </Button>
            {ancestors.length > 1 ? (
              <ActionMenu>
                <ActionMenu.Anchor>
                  <IconButton
                    icon={TriangleDownIcon}
                    size="small"
                    variant="invisible"
                    sx={{
                      px: 2,
                      color: 'fg.default'
                    }}
                  />
                </ActionMenu.Anchor>

                <ActionMenu.Overlay>
                  <ActionList>
                    {ancestors.map((ancestor, index) => (
                      <ActionList.Item key={index} onSelect={() => onClickAncestor(index)}>
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <ItemIcon item={ancestor.item} />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        {ancestor.item.getTitle()}
                        <ActionList.TrailingVisual>#{ancestor.id}</ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    ))}
                  </ActionList>
                </ActionMenu.Overlay>
              </ActionMenu>
            ) : null}
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{px: 2, height: '100%', overflowY: 'auto', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column'}}>
          {items.map((item: SidePanelItem, index: number) => (
            <Card
              handleClick={() => onClickSibling(item)}
              key={index}
              item={item}
              isSelected={sidePanelState.item.id === item.itemId()}
            />
          ))}
        </Box>
      </Box>

<Box

        pb: 3,
        mt: 0,
        px: [3, 4, 5],
        pt: 3,
        bg: 'canvas.inset',
        alignItems: 'center',
        position: 'relative',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
        borderBottom: isNotProjectView ? '1px solid' : 'none',
        borderColor: 'border.subtle'
      }}
    >
      <Routes>
        <Route path={PROJECT_SETTINGS_ROUTE.pathWithChildPaths} element={<RouteTitle title="Settings" />} />
        <Route path={PROJECT_WORKFLOWS_ROUTE.pathWithChildPaths} element={<RouteTitle title="Workflows" />} />
        <Route path={PROJECT_INSIGHTS_ROUTE.pathWithChildPaths} element={<RouteTitle title="Insights" />} />
        <Route path={PROJECT_ARCHIVE_ROUTE.pathWithChildPaths} element={<RouteTitle title="Archived Items" />} />
        <Route path="*" element={<MemexTitle />} />
      </Routes>
      <Box sx={{justifyItems: 'center', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: 2}}>
        {!isPublicProject ? <PresenceAvatars /> : null}

        <Label variant="success">Beta</Label>
        <ClientFeatureFlagsList />
        <ProjectNavigationButtons />
      </Box>

      <FindInProjectInput />
    </Box>

                  boxShadow: 'primary.shadow.focus',
                  borderRadius: '2'
                },
                '&:hover:not(:focus-within)': {
                  boxShadow: theme => `0 0 0 3px ${theme.colors.border.default}`,
                  borderRadius: '2'
                }
              }
            : {}),
          px: 1
        }}

        {hasWritePermissions ? (
          <EmojiPicker>
            <AutosizeTextInput
              as={BorderlessTextInput}
              {...props}
              ref={inputRef}
              sx={{
                fontSize: 3,
                fontWeight: 600
              }}
              autoComplete="off"
              placeholder={Resources.addTitlePlaceholder}
              aria-label={Resources.addTitlePlaceholder}
              value={title}
              onChange={onChange}
              onClick={onClick}
              onBlur={onBlur}
              id="memexTitleInput"
              {...inputCompositionProps}
              {...testIdProps('memex-title')}
            />
          </EmojiPicker>
        ) : (
          <Heading as="h1" sx={{fontSize: 3, fontWeight: 600}} {...testIdProps('memex-title')}>
            {title}
          </Heading>
        )}
      </Box>

<ActionList.Item
      {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-item-search')}
      onSelect={onSelect}
      aria-label={query ? `Search/filters applied: ${query}` : undefined}
      title={query}
    >
      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
        <FilterLeadingVisual />
      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>

      {query ? (
        <TokenizedQuery
          query={query}
          sx={{
            whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
            overflow: 'hidden',
            textOverflow: 'ellipsis',
            maxWidth: 200
          }}
        />
      ) : (
        <Text
          sx={{
            overflow: 'hidden',
            whiteSpace: 'nowrap',
            textOverflow: 'ellipsis'
          }}
        >
          Search or filter this view
        </Text>
      )}

      <ActionList.TrailingVisual>{searchKeys}</ActionList.TrailingVisual>
    </ActionList.Item>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{position: 'relative'}}>
      <MenuAnchor ref={anchorRef} onClick={() => setOpen(s => !s)} />
      <ActionMenu
        anchorRef={anchorRef}
        open={!isCommandPaletteVisible && open}
        onOpenChange={useCallback((nextOpen: boolean): void => setOpen(nextOpen), [])}
      >
        <ActionMenu.Overlay
          {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-modal')}
          width="medium"
          sx={{
            maxHeight: clientHeight,
            overflow: 'auto'
          }}
        >
          <ActionList>
            <ActionList.Group
              title="Layout"
              variant="subtle"
              sx={{
                '& > ul': {display: 'flex', px: 2}
              }}
              {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-layout')}
            >
              <LayoutToggle view={view} setOpen={setOpen} />
            </ActionList.Group>
            <ActionList.Divider />
            <ActionList.Group title="Configuration" variant="subtle">
              <VisibleFieldsItem
                onSelect={useCallback(() => {
                  setShowSubMenu('add-field')
                  setOpen(false)
                }, [])}
              />
              <GroupByConfig
                onSelect={useCallback(() => {
                  setShowSubMenu('group-by')
                  setOpen(false)
                }, [])}
              />
              {view.localViewState.layout === ViewTypeParam.Table ? (
                <SortByConfig onSelect={onSelectSortByConfig} />
              ) : null}
              <FilterByConfig onSelect={handleSearchAction} />
            </ActionList.Group>

            {isInsightsChartViewEnabled ? (
              <>
                <ActionList.Divider />
                <ActionList.Group>
                  <ActionList.LinkItem
                    as={ReactRouterLink}
                    {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-item-show-insights')}
                    to={{
                      pathname: PROJECT_INSIGHTS_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber}),
                      search: query
                        ? `${new URLSearchParams({
                            filterQuery: query
                          })}`
                        : undefined
                    }}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <GraphIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    Generate chart
                  </ActionList.LinkItem>
                </ActionList.Group>
              </>
            ) : null}

            {hasWritePermissions ? (
              <>
                <ActionList.Divider />
                <ViewActionItems
                  handleRenameViewClick={handleRenameViewClick}
                  handleDuplicateView={handleDuplicateView}
                  handleDestroyView={handleDestroyView}
                  viewsLength={views.length}
                  view={view}
                />
              </>
            ) : null}

            {view.isViewStateDirty ? (
              <>
                <ActionList.Divider />
                <ActionList.Group sx={{'& > ul': {display: 'flex'}}}>
                  <ViewChangeButtons setOpen={setOpen} view={view} />
                </ActionList.Group>
              </>
            ) : null}
          </ActionList>
        </ActionMenu.Overlay>
      </ActionMenu>

      <AddColumnMenu
        anchorRef={anchorRef}
        open={showSubMenu === 'add-field'}
        setOpen={useCallback((nextOpen: boolean) => setShowSubMenu(m => (nextOpen ? 'add-field' : null)), [])}
      />
      <GroupByMenu
        anchorRef={anchorRef}
        open={showSubMenu === 'group-by'}
        setOpen={useCallback((nextOpen: boolean) => setShowSubMenu(m => (nextOpen ? 'group-by' : null)), [])}
      />

      <SortByMenu
        anchorRef={anchorRef}
        open={showSubMenu === 'sort-by'}
        setOpen={useCallback((nextOpen: boolean) => setShowSubMenu(m => (nextOpen ? 'sort-by' : null)), [])}
      />
    </Box>

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<ActionList.Item
      sx={{
        flex: 1,
        border: '1px solid',
        borderColor: selected ? 'accent.emphasis' : 'border.default',
        textAlign: 'center',
        cursor: 'pointer',
        backgroundColor: selected ? 'accent.subtle' : '',
        boxShadow: selected ? theme => `inset 0 0 0 1px ${theme.colors.accent.emphasis}` : '',
        borderRadius: 0,
        mx: 0,
        mb: 2,
        mt: 1,
        '&:hover': {
          backgroundColor: !selected ? 'canvas.subtle' : ''
        },
        '&:first-of-type': {
          borderTopLeftRadius: 2,
          borderBottomLeftRadius: 2,
          borderRight: selected ? undefined : '0'
        },
        '&:last-of-type': {
          borderTopRightRadius: 2,
          borderBottomRightRadius: 2,
          borderLeft: selected ? undefined : '0'
        }
      }}
      onSelect={() => handleViewTypeChange(value)}
    >
      <Box sx={{fontWeight: 'normal', cursor: 'pointer', px: 3, py: 2, mb: 0}} {...props}>
        <Box sx={{textAlign: 'center', flexDirection: 'column', m: 'auto', alignItems: 'center', display: 'flex'}}>
          <PotentiallyDirty isDirty={isDirty && selected} hideDirtyState={isDisabled}>
            <StyledOcticon icon={Icon} sx={{color: selected ? 'fg.default' : 'fg.muted'}} size="medium" />
          </PotentiallyDirty>
          <Text sx={{color: selected ? 'fg.default' : 'fg.muted', fontSize: 0}}>{children}</Text>
        </Box>
      </Box>
    </ActionList.Item>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{mr: 0}} className="js-context-menu-trigger">
          <ActionMenu open={menuOpen} onOpenChange={setMenuOpen} anchorRef={contextMenuRef}>
            <ActionMenu.Anchor>
              <IconButton
                variant="invisible"
                icon={KebabHorizontalIcon}
                {...testIdProps('card-context-menu-trigger')}
                aria-label="More actions"
                sx={{
                  ml: 1,
                  color: 'fg.muted',
                  width: '24px',
                  height: '24px',
                  padding: 0
                }}
              />
            </ActionMenu.Anchor>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay
              anchorSide="inside-right"
              portalContainerName={`column-${itemColumnValue?.id ?? 'no_vertical_group'}-portal-root`}
            >
              <ActionList>
                {convertToIssue ? (
                  <ActionList.Item onSelect={convertToIssue} {...testIdProps('card-context-menu-convert-to-issue')}>
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <IssueOpenedIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    Convert to issue
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ) : null}
                {archiveItem ? (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    id={IconAndTitleItems.ARCHIVE_ITEM}
                    onSelect={() => archiveItem?.(BoardCardActionMenuUI)}
                    {...testIdProps('card-context-menu-archive-item')}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <ArchiveIcon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    {isItemSelected && filteredSelectedCardIds.length > 1
                      ? `Archive ${filteredSelectedCardIds.length} selected items`
                      : 'Archive'}
                    <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                      <EKey />
                    </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ) : null}
                <ActionList.Item
                  id={IconAndTitleItems.DELETE_FROM_PROJECT}
                  variant="danger"
                  onSelect={() => removeItem(BoardCardActionMenuUI)}
                  {...testIdProps('card-context-menu-delete')}
                >
                  <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    <TrashIcon />
                  </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  {isItemSelected && filteredSelectedCardIds.length > 1
                    ? `Delete ${filteredSelectedCardIds.length} selected items from project`
                    : 'Delete from project'}
                  <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                    <DelKey />
                  </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                </ActionList.Item>
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>
        </Box>

usage.text:
<Link
      role="button"
      href={href}
      target="_blank"
      rel="noreferrer"
      onClick={openSidePanel}
      {...testIdProps('card-side-panel-trigger')}
    >
      <SanitizedHtmlSpan
        ref={ref}
        sx={{
          code: {
            fontFamily: 'fonts.mono',
            fontSize: 0
          },
          color: 'fg.default',
          '&:hover': {
            cursor: 'pointer',
            color: 'accent.fg',
            textDecoration: 'underline'
          }
        }}
      >
        {html}
      </SanitizedHtmlSpan>
    </Link>

props.name: sx

usage.text:
<Box
          sx={{
            bg: 'canvas.inset',
            alignItems: 'center',
            justifyContent: 'space-between',
            maxWidth: COLUMN_WIDTH,
            px: '10px',
            pt: 2,
            // The scrollable container of the cards has the other 2px of padding
            pb: '2px',
            display: 'flex'
          }}
          {...drag.handle.props}
        >
          <Box sx={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center'}}>
            <EditableColumnName
              option={option}
              onNameChange={submitRenameColumn}
              isUserEditable={isUserEditable}
              initialFocus={initialNameFocus}
              isEditing={isEditingName}
              setIsEditing={setIsEditingName}
            />

            <CounterLabel sx={{color: 'fg.muted', ml: 2}} {...testIdProps('column-counter')}>
              {items.length}
            </CounterLabel>

            {isCurrentIteration && <CurrentIterationLabel sx={{ml: 2}} />}
          </Box>

          <Box sx={{backgroundColor: 'canvas.inset', alignItems: 'center', display: 'flex'}}>
            {isUserEditable && (
              <ActionMenu>
                <ActionMenu.Anchor>
                  <IconButton
                    variant="invisible"
                    icon={KebabHorizontalIcon}
                    aria-label="Column context menu"
                    {...testIdProps('column-context-menu-trigger')}
                    sx={{
                      color: 'fg.muted',
                      width: '24px',
                      height: '24px',
                      padding: 0
                    }}
                  />
                </ActionMenu.Anchor>
                <ActionMenu.Overlay align="end">
                  <ActionList>
                    <ActionList.Item onSelect={renameOnClick} {...testIdProps('column-context-menu-rename')}>
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <PencilIcon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      Rename
                    </ActionList.Item>
                    <ActionList.Item
                      disabled={archiveableItems.length === 0}
                      onSelect={archiveOnClick}
                      {...testIdProps('column-context-menu-archive')}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <ArchiveIcon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      Archive all cards
                    </ActionList.Item>

                    <ActionList.Item
                      variant="danger"
                      onSelect={deleteOnClick}
                      {...testIdProps('column-context-menu-delete')}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <TrashIcon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      Delete
                    </ActionList.Item>
                  </ActionList>
                </ActionMenu.Overlay>
              </ActionMenu>
            )}
          </Box>
        </Box>

usage.text:
<Box
        {...drop.props}
        ref={dropRef}
        {...testIdProps(`drop-zone-${option.name}`)}
        sx={{
          flexDirection: 'column',
          backgroundColor: 'canvas.inset',
          flexGrow: 1,
          overflowY: 'auto',
          position: 'relative',
          px: '10px',
          pt: '2px',
          display: 'flex'
        }}
      >
        {showEmptyColumnSash && <Sash />}
        {/* We use a `null` (for window) rootRef instead of the drop ref so
        that we still render while dragging */}
        <ObserverProvider rootRef={null} sizeEstimate={125} disableHide={isDragging}>
          {items.map((item, cardIndex) => {
            const focusType =
              focusedCard?.details.x === index && focusedCard?.details.y === item.id ? focusedCard.focusType : undefined
            return (
              <DraggableCard
                key={item.id}
                item={item}
                index={cardIndex}
                column={option.id}
                columnIndex={index}
                focusType={focusType}
              />
            )
          })}
        </ObserverProvider>

        <IsAddingItemsIndicator isVisible={Boolean(isAddingNewItems)} />
        <NamedPortalRoot portalname={`column-${option.id}-portal-root`} />
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Box
        sx={{
          width: calendarButton ? '22ch' : '16ch',
          flexGrow: fullWidth ? 1 : 0,
          position: 'relative'
        }}
      >
        <TextInput
          {...inputProps}
          onFocus={e => {
            inputProps.onFocus?.(e)
            if (!disableShortcuts) arrowKeyModeRef.current = true
            onFocus?.()
          }}
          onBlur={e => {
            arrowKeyModeRef.current = false
            inputProps.onBlur?.(e)
            resetText()
          }}
          onChange={(e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
            inputProps.onChange?.(e)
            arrowKeyModeRef.current = false
          }}
          onKeyDown={keyDownHandler}
          // Order is onMouseDown -> onFocus -> onClick -> onMouseUp, so mouseDown will set false and then
          // focus will set true, unless it was already focused in which case it will stay false.
          // This lets the user click again inside the input to exit arrow key mode.
          onMouseDown={() => (arrowKeyModeRef.current = false)}
          onMouseUp={() => {
            // Sometimes if the user moves their mouse slightly on the initial click, the browser will treat it
            // as selecting text and then we won't have all text selected, so we have to re-trigger selectAll.
            if (arrowKeyModeRef.current) selectAll()
          }}
          size="small"
          placeholder={placeholder}
          aria-label={ariaLabel}
          aria-describedby={descriptionId}
          aria-errormessage={errorId}
          ref={inputRef}
          sx={{width: '100%', borderColor: activeRangeEnd ? 'accent.fg' : undefined, ...sx}}
          disabled={disabled}
        />
        <ValidationErrorPopover id={errorId} message={validity.message} position="above" />
        <HiddenDescription id={descriptionId}>
          {!disableShortcuts ? DateResources.shortcutInputDescription : DateResources.dateInputDescription}
        </HiddenDescription>
      </Box>

usage.text:
<FormControl
        sx={{
          width: '14ch',
          maxWidth: '100%',
          flexGrow: fullWidth ? 1 : 0,
          position: 'relative'
        }}
      >
        <FormControl.Label visuallyHidden>Selected Dates</FormControl.Label>
        {typedDate && validity.status === 'success' ? (
          <FormControl.Validation variant="success" aria-live="polite">
            Press <KeyboardKey>Enter</KeyboardKey> to add {format(typedDate)}.
          </FormControl.Validation>
        ) : validity.status === 'error' && validity.message ? (
          <FormControl.Validation variant="error" aria-live="polite">
            {validity.message}
          </FormControl.Validation>
        ) : (
          <FormControl.Caption aria-live="polite">
            Hold <KeyboardKey>{isMacOS() ? '' : 'Ctrl'}</KeyboardKey> to click multiple dates.
          </FormControl.Caption>
        )}
        {input}
      </FormControl>

<Box ref={anchorRef} sx={{display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center'}}>
          <SingleDateInput
            aria-label="Start date"
            ref={firstRef}
            value={selection?.from ?? null}
            onChange={from => onDateInput({from, to: selection?.to ?? null})}
            onFocus={() => setActiveRangeEnd('from')}
            fullWidth={fullWidth}
            disableShortcuts={isAnchor}
            activeRangeEnd={!isAnchor && activeRangeEnd === 'from'}
            calendarButton={calendarButtonProps}
            sx={sx}
            disabled={disabled}
          />
          <Text sx={{flexGrow: 0, pr: 1, pl: 1}}>{' - '}</Text>
          <SingleDateInput
            aria-label="End date"
            ref={secondRef}
            value={selection?.to ?? null}
            onChange={to => onDateInput({from: selection?.from ?? to, to})}
            onFocus={() => setActiveRangeEnd('to')}
            fullWidth={fullWidth}
            disableShortcuts={isAnchor}
            activeRangeEnd={!isAnchor && activeRangeEnd === 'to'}
            calendarButton={rangeEndCalendarButtonProps}
            sx={sx}
            disabled={disabled}
          />
        </Box>

<Box sx={{pt: 2, display: 'flex', gap: 2, justifyContent: 'space-between', minHeight: '36px'}} as="footer">
    <Box sx={{display: 'flex', gap: 1, alignItems: 'center', fontSize: 0}}>
      {previewMode ? (
        <></>
      ) : fileUploadProgress ? (
        <Text sx={{py: 1, px: 2}}>
          <Spinner size="small" sx={{mr: 1, verticalAlign: 'text-bottom'}} />{' '}
          {MarkdownEditorResources.filesUploadingNote(fileUploadProgress)}
        </Text>
      ) : errorMessage ? (
        <Text sx={{py: 1, px: 2, color: 'danger.fg'}} aria-live="polite" {...testIdProps('error-message')}>
          <Text sx={{mr: 1}}>
            <AlertIcon size="small" />
          </Text>{' '}
          {errorMessage}
        </Text>
      ) : (
        <>
          <MarkdownSupportedHint condensed={condensed} />

          {uploadButtonProps && (
            <>
              <VisualSeparator />
              <FileUploadButton condensed={condensed} fileDraggedOver={fileDraggedOver} {...uploadButtonProps} />
            </>
          )}
        </>
      )}
    </Box>
    {!fileUploadProgress && <Box sx={{display: 'flex', gap: 2}}>{actionButtons}</Box>}
  </Box>

usage.text:
<LinkButton
    leadingIcon={MarkdownIcon}
    variant="invisible"
    size="small"
    sx={{color: 'fg.default', fontWeight: 'normal', px: 2}}
    href="https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/writing-on-github/getting-started-with-writing-and-formatting-on-github/basic-writing-and-formatting-syntax"
    target="_blank"
    // The markdown editor aria-description already describes it as Markdown editor, so it's
    // redundant to say Markdown is supported again here. However for sighted users, they
    // cannot see the aria-description so this is a useful hint for them. So the aria-label
    // is different from the visible text content.
    aria-label={MarkdownEditorResources.markdownDocsLabel}
  >
    {!condensed && <Text aria-hidden>{MarkdownEditorResources.markdownHint}</Text>}
  </LinkButton>

            selectedView={view}

usage.text:
<Box sx={{mb: 4}}>
      <Text as="label" sx={{display: 'flex', mb: 2}}>
        Layout
      </Text>
      <ActionMenu>
        <ActionMenu.Button
          aria-label="Select layout"
          leadingIcon={selectedLayout?.icon}
          sx={selectorDropdownButtonStyles}
        >
          {selectedLayout?.label ?? 'None'}
        </ActionMenu.Button>
        <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={selectorDropdownOverlayStyles}>
          <ActionList selectionVariant="single" {...testIdProps('chart-layout-list')}>
            {chartLayouts.map((chartLayout, index) => {
              return (
                <ActionList.Item
                  key={index}
                  selected={chartLayout.type === localVersionType}
                  onSelect={() => handleUpdateLayout(chartLayout)}
                >
                  <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    <chartLayout.icon />
                  </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  {chartLayout.label}
                </ActionList.Item>
              )
            })}
          </ActionList>
        </ActionMenu.Overlay>
      </ActionMenu>
    </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{mb: 4}}>
        <Text as="label" sx={{display: 'flex', mb: 2}}>
          X-axis
        </Text>
        <ActionMenu>
          <ActionMenu.Button
            aria-label="Select X-axis"
            leadingIcon={selectedXAxis?.icon}
            sx={getDropdownSx(xAxisIsInvalidField)}
          >
            {xAxisLabel}
          </ActionMenu.Button>
          <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={selectorDropdownOverlayStyles}>
            <ActionList selectionVariant="single" {...testIdProps('chart-x-axis-list')}>
              {isInsightsEnabled && (
                <ActionList.Group title="Historical">
                  {historicalXAxisOptions.map((field, index) => {
                    return (
                      <ActionList.Item
                        key={index}
                        selected={selectedXAxis?.type === field.type}
                        onSelect={() => handleXAxisChange(field)}
                      >
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <field.icon />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        {field.label}
                        {isInsightsPreview && (
                          <ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                            <Tooltip aria-label="This is a preview feature" direction="nw">
                              <BeakerIcon />
                            </Tooltip>
                          </ActionList.TrailingVisual>
                        )}
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    )
                  })}
                </ActionList.Group>
              )}
              <ActionList.Group title={isInsightsEnabled ? 'Fields' : ''}>
                {fieldXAxisOptions.map((field, index) => (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    key={index}
                    selected={selectedXAxis?.type === field.type}
                    onSelect={() => handleXAxisChange(field)}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <field.icon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    {field.label}
                  </ActionList.Item>
                ))}
              </ActionList.Group>
            </ActionList>
          </ActionMenu.Overlay>
        </ActionMenu>
        {xAxisIsInvalidField ? invalidConfigMessage : null}
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Box sx={{mb: 4}}>
        <Text as="label" sx={{display: 'flex', mb: 2}}>
          Group by (optional)
        </Text>
        <ActionMenu>
          <ActionMenu.Button
            aria-label="Select X-axis group by"
            leadingIcon={selectedXAxisGroupBy?.icon}
            disabled={isHistoricalChart(chart) && !memex_historical_charts_on_custom_columns}
            sx={getDropdownSx(groupByIsInvalidField)}
          >
            {xAxisGroupByButtonLabel}
          </ActionMenu.Button>
          <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={selectorDropdownOverlayStyles}>
            <ActionList selectionVariant="single" {...testIdProps('chart-x-axis-group-by-list')}>
              <ActionList.Item
                selected={chart.localVersion.configuration.xAxis.groupBy === undefined}
                onSelect={() => handleXAxisGroupByChange(null)}
              >
                None
              </ActionList.Item>
              {xAxisGroupByOptions.map((field, index) => {
                return (
                  <ActionList.Item
                    key={index}
                    selected={chart.localVersion.configuration.xAxis.groupBy?.column === field.type}
                    onSelect={() => handleXAxisGroupByChange(field.type)}
                  >
                    <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      <field.icon />
                    </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                    {field.label}
                  </ActionList.Item>
                )
              })}
            </ActionList>
          </ActionMenu.Overlay>
        </ActionMenu>
        {groupByIsInvalidField ? invalidConfigMessage : null}
      </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{mb: 4}}>
      <Text as="label" sx={{display: 'flex', mb: 2}}>
        Y-axis
      </Text>
      <ActionMenu>
        <ActionMenu.Button
          aria-label="Select Y-axis"
          disabled={chartIsHistorical && !memex_historical_charts_on_custom_columns}
          sx={selectorDropdownButtonStyles}
        >
          {selectedAggregateOperation?.label ?? 'None'}
        </ActionMenu.Button>
        <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={selectorDropdownOverlayStyles}>
          <ActionList selectionVariant="single" {...testIdProps('chart-y-axis-list')}>
            {aggregateOperationOptions.map((aggregate, index) => {
              return (
                <ActionList.Item
                  key={index}
                  selected={selectedAggregateOperation?.type === aggregate.type}
                  onSelect={() => handleAggregateOperationChange(aggregate)}
                  disabled={doesAggregateOperationNeedField(aggregate.type) && aggregateFieldOptions.length === 0}
                >
                  {aggregate.label}
                </ActionList.Item>
              )
            })}
          </ActionList>
        </ActionMenu.Overlay>
      </ActionMenu>
      {selectedAggregateOperation && doesAggregateOperationNeedField(selectedAggregateOperation.type) ? (
        <>
          <ActionMenu>
            <ActionMenu.Button
              aria-label="Select Y-axis field"
              sx={{
                ...selectorDropdownButtonStyles,
                mt: 3,
                ...errorBorderStyles
              }}
              leadingIcon={selectedAggregateFieldOption?.icon}
              disabled={
                (chartIsHistorical && !memex_historical_charts_on_custom_columns) || aggregateFieldOptions.length === 0
              }
            >
              {aggregationFieldLabel}
            </ActionMenu.Button>
            <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={selectorDropdownOverlayStyles}>
              <ActionList selectionVariant="single" {...testIdProps('chart-y-axis-field-list')}>
                {aggregateFieldOptions.map((option, index) => {
                  return (
                    <ActionList.Item
                      key={index}
                      selected={selectedAggregateFieldOption?.field.databaseId === option.field.databaseId}
                      onSelect={() => handleAggregateFieldChange([option.field.databaseId])}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <option.icon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      {option.field.name}
                    </ActionList.Item>
                  )
                })}
              </ActionList>
            </ActionMenu.Overlay>
          </ActionMenu>
          {aggregateFieldIsInvalid ? invalidConfigMessage : null}
        </>
      ) : null}
    </Box>

props.name: onClick

usage.text:
<Button
      {...testIdProps('add-chart-button')}
      onClick={useCallback(async () => {
        const createChartRequest = getCreateChartRequest()
        if (canCreateChart()) {
          await createChartConfiguration.perform(createChartRequest)
          if (createChartConfiguration.status.current.status === 'succeeded') {
            const newChart = createChartConfiguration.status.current.data
            navigate(PROJECT_INSIGHTS_NUMBER_ROUTE.generatePath({projectNumber, insightNumber: newChart.chart.number}))
          }
        } else {
          // TODO: Update this alert to show the actual upgrade dialog
          alert(
            // eslint-disable-next-line i18n-text/no-en
            `Private projects are limited to 2 custom charts.  Make your project public or upgrade your plan to add more charts.`
          )
        }
      }, [getCreateChartRequest, canCreateChart, createChartConfiguration, navigate, projectNumber])}
      sx={{
        ml: 2
      }}
      leadingIcon={PlusIcon}
    >
      New chart
    </Button>

usage.name: ActionList
usage.text:
<ActionList sx={{pt: 1}} {...testIdProps('insights-side-nav')}>
        <ActionList.Group title="Default charts">
          {defaultCharts.map(chartConfiguration => {
            const isActiveChart = insightNumber === 0
            const chartDirtyState = getDirtyChartState(chartConfiguration)
            const Icon = chartLayoutsMap[chartConfiguration.localVersion.configuration.type].icon

            return (
              <ChartLink
                {...testIdProps('default-chart-navigation-item')}
                key={chartConfiguration.number}
                isDirty={chartDirtyState.isDirty}
                to={getChartLinkTo(chartConfiguration.number).url}
                isActive={isActiveChart}
                leadingVisual={<Icon />}
                trailingVisual={
                  <ChartItemTrailingVisual
                    chartConfiguration={chartConfiguration}
                    isActiveChart={isActiveChart}
                    isInsightsPreview={isInsightsPreview}
                  />
                }
                // no navigation when already active
                onClick={e => {
                  if (isActiveChart) {
                    e.preventDefault()
                  } else {
                    postChartNavigationStats(chartConfiguration.number, chartConfiguration.localVersion.configuration)
                  }
                }}
              >
                {chartConfiguration.name}
              </ChartLink>
            )
          })}
        </ActionList.Group>
        <ActionList.Divider />
        <ActionList.Group title="My charts">
          {myCharts.map(chartConfiguration => {
            const isActiveChart = insightNumber === chartConfiguration.number
            const chartDirtyState = getDirtyChartState(chartConfiguration)
            const Icon = chartLayoutsMap[chartConfiguration.localVersion.configuration.type].icon

            return (
              <ChartLink
                {...testIdProps('my-chart-navigation-item')}
                key={chartConfiguration.number}
                to={getChartLinkTo(chartConfiguration.number).url}
                isActive={isActiveChart}
                isDirty={chartDirtyState.isDirty}
                leadingVisual={<Icon />}
                trailingVisual={
                  <ChartItemTrailingVisual
                    chartConfiguration={chartConfiguration}
                    isActiveChart={isActiveChart}
                    isInsightsPreview={isInsightsPreview}
                  />
                }
                // no navigation when already active
                onClick={e => {
                  if (isActiveChart) {
                    e.preventDefault()
                  } else {
                    postChartNavigationStats(chartConfiguration.number, chartConfiguration.localVersion.configuration)
                  }
                }}
              >
                {chartConfiguration.name}
              </ChartLink>
            )
          })}
        </ActionList.Group>
      </ActionList>

usage.name: ActionMenu
usage.text:
<ActionMenu open={open} onOpenChange={onOpenChange} anchorRef={anchorRef}>
        <ActionMenu.Overlay sx={{zIndex: 3}} returnFocusRef={returnFocusRef} width="medium">
          <ActionList>
            {canEditName && (
              <Box as="li" sx={{listStyleType: 'none'}}>
                <EmojiPicker sx={{display: 'block', px: 2}}>
                  <TextInput
                    value={chartName}
                    tabIndex={-1}
                    sx={{my: 2}}
                    aria-label="Chart name"
                    placeholder="Chart name"
                    onClick={(e: React.MouseEvent) => {
                      e.preventDefault()
                    }}
                    onChange={onChangeField}
                    onFocus={onFocusField}
                    {...inputCompositionProps}
                  />
                </EmojiPicker>
              </Box>
            )}
            <ActionList.Item onSelect={openPane} {...testIdProps('chart-options-open-configure')}>
              <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                <PotentiallyDirty isDirty={isConfigurationDirty}>
                  <PencilIcon />
                </PotentiallyDirty>
              </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
              Configure
            </ActionList.Item>
            <ActionList.Item onSelect={handleDuplicateChart}>
              <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                <VersionsIcon />
              </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
              {isDirty ? 'Save changes to new chart' : 'Duplicate chart'}
            </ActionList.Item>
            {chartIsDefault ? null : (
              <ActionList.Item variant="danger" onSelect={handleDeleteChart}>
                <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  <TrashIcon />
                </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                Delete chart
              </ActionList.Item>
            )}

            {isDirty ? (
              <>
                <ActionList.Divider />
                <ActionList.Group sx={{'& > ul': {display: 'flex'}}}>
                  {hasWritePermissions && userDefinedChart ? (
                    <ActionList.Item
                      onSelect={handleSaveChanges}
                      {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-save-changes-button')}
                      sx={{
                        flex: 'auto',
                        color: 'accent.fg',
                        borderRight: '1px solid',
                        borderColor: 'border.default',
                        borderRadius: 0,
                        my: -2,
                        mx: 0,
                        py: 3,
                        textAlign: 'center',
                        fontWeight: 'normal',
                        '&:hover': {
                          bg: 'canvas.inset'
                        }
                      }}
                    >
                      Save changes
                    </ActionList.Item>
                  ) : null}
                  <ActionList.Item
                    onSelect={handleDiscardChanges}
                    {...testIdProps('chart-options-menu-reset-changes-button')}
                    sx={{
                      flex: 'auto',
                      color: 'fg.muted',
                      borderRadius: 0,
                      my: -2,
                      mx: 0,
                      py: 3,
                      textAlign: 'center',
                      fontWeight: 'normal',
                      '&:hover': {
                        bg: 'canvas.inset'
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    Discard changes
                  </ActionList.Item>
                </ActionList.Group>
              </>
            ) : null}
          </ActionList>
        </ActionMenu.Overlay>
      </ActionMenu>

            <ActionList.Item onSelect={handleDuplicateChart}>
              <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                <VersionsIcon />
              </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
              {isDirty ? 'Save changes to new chart' : 'Duplicate chart'}
            </ActionList.Item>
            {chartIsDefault ? null : (
              <ActionList.Item variant="danger" onSelect={handleDeleteChart}>
                <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                  <TrashIcon />
                </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                Delete chart
              </ActionList.Item>
            )}

            {isDirty ? (
              <>
                <ActionList.Divider />
                <ActionList.Group sx={{'& > ul': {display: 'flex'}}}>
                  {hasWritePermissions && userDefinedChart ? (
                    <ActionList.Item
                      onSelect={handleSaveChanges}
                      {...testIdProps('view-options-menu-save-changes-button')}
                      sx={{
                        flex: 'auto',
                        color: 'accent.fg',
                        borderRight: '1px solid',
                        borderColor: 'border.default',
                        borderRadius: 0,
                        my: -2,
                        mx: 0,
                        py: 3,
                        textAlign: 'center',
                        fontWeight: 'normal',
                        '&:hover': {
                          bg: 'canvas.inset'
                        }
                      }}
                    >
                      Save changes
                    </ActionList.Item>
                  ) : null}
                  <ActionList.Item
                    onSelect={handleDiscardChanges}
                    {...testIdProps('chart-options-menu-reset-changes-button')}
                    sx={{
                      flex: 'auto',
                      color: 'fg.muted',
                      borderRadius: 0,
                      my: -2,
                      mx: 0,
                      py: 3,
                      textAlign: 'center',
                      fontWeight: 'normal',
                      '&:hover': {
                        bg: 'canvas.inset'
                      }
                    }}
                  >
                    Discard changes
                  </ActionList.Item>
                </ActionList.Group>
              </>
            ) : null}
          </ActionList>

usage.text:
<Box sx={{position: 'relative', px: 2, pt: 2}}>
        <form ref={formRef} onSubmit={e => e.preventDefault()}>
          <FormControl id="update-column-name-input">
            <FormControl.Label visuallyHidden>Column name</FormControl.Label>
            <EmojiPicker sx={{display: 'block', width: '100%'}}>
              {/* id and aria-describedby must be provided to the input, as the FormControl does not propagate this for our EmojiPicker wrapped input */}
              <TextInput
                id="update-column-name-input"
                ref={inputRef}
                value={name}
                tabIndex={-1}
                block
                placeholder="Column name"
                onChange={onChangeField}
                onFocus={onFocusField}
                {...inputCompositionProps}
                disabled={!hasWritePermissions}
                validationStatus={!isTitleValid ? 'error' : undefined}
                aria-invalid={!isTitleValid}
                aria-describedby="update-column-name-input-invalid"
              />
            </EmojiPicker>
            {!isTitleValid && (
              <FormControl.Validation
                id="update-column-name-input-invalid"
                variant="error"
                sx={{maxWidth: formSize?.clientWidth ? `${formSize.clientWidth}px` : 'unset'}}
              >
                {validationMessage}
              </FormControl.Validation>
            )}
          </FormControl>
        </form>
      </Box>

usage.text:
<Box
            sx={{
              display: 'flex',
              alignItems: 'center',
              justifyContent: 'center',
              px: 0,
              py: 0,
              gap: 1
            }}
          >
            <SortedLabel />
            <GroupedLabel />
            {!isNewMemex ? (
              <ActionMenu open={menuOpen} onOpenChange={open => setMenuState(open)}>
                <ActionMenu.Anchor>
                  <IconButton
                    icon={KebabHorizontalIcon}
                    variant="invisible"
                    sx={{
                      display: 'flex',
                      alignItems: 'center',
                      justifyContent: 'center',
                      px: 0,
                      py: 0,
                      height: 18,
                      width: 20,
                      color: 'fg.muted'
                    }}
                    aria-label={`${columnModel.name} column options`}
                    {...testIdProps(`${columnModel.name}-column-menu-trigger`)}
                  />
                </ActionMenu.Anchor>
                <ActionMenu.Overlay {...testIdProps(`${columnModel.name}-column-menu`)}>
                  <>{columnModel.userDefined && textField}</>
                  <ActionList>
                    {columnModel.userDefined && <ActionMenu.Divider sx={{mt: 0}} />}
                    {sortMenuOptions}
                    {itemOperations.length > 0 && <ActionMenu.Divider />}
                    {itemOperations}
                    <ActionMenu.Divider />
                    <ActionList.Item
                      onSelect={onHideColumn}
                      disabled={columnModel.dataType === MemexColumnDataType.Title || isSortedByThisColumn}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <EyeClosedIcon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      Hide field
                    </ActionList.Item>
                    {hasWritePermissions && (
                      <ActionList.Item
                        variant="danger"
                        onSelect={openDialog}
                        disabled={!columnModel.userDefined || !hasWritePermissions}
                      >
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <TrashIcon />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        Delete field
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    )}
                  </ActionList>
                </ActionMenu.Overlay>
              </ActionMenu>
            ) : null}
          </Box>

                      height: 18,
                      width: 20,
                      color: 'fg.muted'
                    }}
                    aria-label={`${columnModel.name} column options`}
                    {...testIdProps(`${columnModel.name}-column-menu-trigger`)}
                  />
                </ActionMenu.Anchor>
                <ActionMenu.Overlay {...testIdProps(`${columnModel.name}-column-menu`)}>
                  <>{columnModel.userDefined && textField}</>
                  <ActionList>
                    {columnModel.userDefined && <ActionMenu.Divider sx={{mt: 0}} />}
                    {sortMenuOptions}
                    {itemOperations.length > 0 && <ActionMenu.Divider />}
                    {itemOperations}
                    <ActionMenu.Divider />
                    <ActionList.Item
                      onSelect={onHideColumn}
                      disabled={columnModel.dataType === MemexColumnDataType.Title || isSortedByThisColumn}
                    >
                      <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        <EyeClosedIcon />
                      </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                      Hide field
                    </ActionList.Item>
                    {hasWritePermissions && (
                      <ActionList.Item
                        variant="danger"
                        onSelect={openDialog}
                        disabled={!columnModel.userDefined || !hasWritePermissions}
                      >
                        <ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                          <TrashIcon />
                        </ActionList.LeadingVisual>
                        Delete field
                      </ActionList.Item>
                    )}
                  </ActionList>
                </ActionMenu.Overlay>
              </ActionMenu>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box sx={{flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'flex-start', flexWrap: 'nowrap', display: 'flex'}}>
          <Box
            ref={containerRef}
            onClick={() => inputRef.current && inputRef.current.focus()}
            sx={{
              flex: 1,
              width: '100%',
              display: 'flex',
              boxShadow: theme => isInputActive && theme.shadows.btn.focusShadow,
              flexDirection: 'row',
              borderRadius: 2,
              borderWidth: '1px',
              borderStyle: 'solid',
              borderColor: isInputActive ? 'accent.emphasis' : 'border.default'
            }}
          >
            <StyledOcticon icon={PersonIcon} sx={{m: 2, color: 'fg.muted'}} />
            <Box
              sx={{
                flexDirection: 'row',
                display: 'flex',
                flex: 1,
                flexWrap: 'wrap',
                cursor: 'text'
              }}
            >
              {selectedCollaborators.map(collaborator => {
                const {id, avatarUrl, actor_type} = collaborator
                return (
                  <CollaboratorPill
                    key={id}
                    avatarUrl={avatarUrl}
                    login={getCollaboratorDisplayValue(collaborator)}
                    id={id}
                    onRemove={() => onPillRemoved(id, actor_type)}
                  />
                )
              })}

              <BorderlessTextInput
                role="combobox"
                aria-haspopup="listbox"
                aria-expanded={showCollaboratorSuggestionsList}
                aria-autocomplete="list"
                aria-controls={FILTER_COLLABORATORS_LIST_ID}
                aria-label={addCollaboratorsLabel}
                style={{
                  flex: 1,
                  width: 'auto',
                  display: 'inline'
                }}
                autoComplete="off"
                ref={inputRef}
                onInput={onInput}
                onFocus={onFocus}
                onBlur={onBlur}
                onKeyDown={onKeyDown}
                placeholder={addCollaboratorsLabel}
                id="add-collaborators-input"
                {...testIdProps('add-collaborators-input')}
              />

              {showCollaboratorSuggestionsList && (
                <SuggestionsList
                  testId={FILTER_COLLABORATORS_LIST_ID}
                  listRef={listRef}
                  controllingElementRef={inputRef}
                  xOriginEdgeAlign="left"
                  style={{width: '400px'}}
                  items={suggestedCollaborators.map(collaborator => {
                    return {
                      renderItem: () => renderCollabSuggestionItem(collaborator),
                      key: collaborator.id,
                      value: getCollaboratorDisplayValue(collaborator),
                      asHTML: true,
                      onSelect: () => onSuggestionSelect(collaborator),
                      testId: `collaborator-suggestion-item-${getCollaboratorDisplayValue(collaborator)}`
                    }
                  })}
                />
              )}
            </Box>
          </Box>
          <Box sx={{mx: 2}}>
            <CollaboratorRoleDropDown selectedRoles={[selectedRole]} handleOnClick={setSelectedRole} />
          </Box>
          <Button variant="primary" onClick={onSubmit} {...testIdProps('add-collaborators-invite-button')}>
            Invite
          </Button>
        </Box>

usage.text:
<Box sx={{display: 'flex', flex: 'auto', alignItems: 'center'}}>
        <Box sx={{mr: 3}}>
          <input
            type="checkbox"
            checked={isSelected}
            name={actorIdentifier(collaborator)}
            onChange={onCheckboxChange}
            {...testIdProps(`collaborators-checkbox-${displayValue}`)}
          />
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', flex: 'auto'}}>
          <Avatar
            alt={displayValue}
            src={collaborator.avatarUrl}
            size={32}
            sx={{mr: 3}}
            data-hovercard-type={collaborator.actor_type}
            data-hovercard-url={getCollaboratorHovercardUrl(collaborator, projectOwner)}
          />
          <Box sx={{display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column'}}>
            <Link
              data-hovercard-type={collaborator.actor_type}
              data-hovercard-url={getCollaboratorHovercardUrl(collaborator, projectOwner)}
              sx={{cursor: 'pointer', textDecoration: 'none', fontWeight: 'bold'}}
              href={getCollaboratorUrl(collaborator, projectOwner)}
            >
              {collaborator.name}
            </Link>

            <Text sx={{color: 'fg.muted'}} data-test-id="collaborator-login">
              {displayValue}
            </Text>
          </Box>
        </Box>
        <CollaboratorRoleDropDown
          selectedRoles={[roleAssigned]}
          handleOnClick={(role: Permission) => onDropDownClick(role, new Set([actorIdentifier(collaborator)]))}
        />
        <Button
          variant="invisible"
          onClick={() => onRemoveButtonClick(new Set([actorIdentifier(collaborator)]))}
          {...testIdProps(`remove-collaborator-${displayValue}`)}
          sx={{
            color: 'fg.muted',
            border: '1px solid',
            borderColor: 'transparent',
            boxShadow: 'none',

          value={Number.isNaN(value.quantity) ? '' : value.quantity}
          onChange={onQtyChange}
          onKeyDown={ignoreNonDigitNumberChars}
          aria-invalid={!qtyValidity.isValid}
          aria-describedby={qtyValidity.message && qtyValidationMessageId}
          aria-label="Duration quantity"
          sx={{
            '&.error': {
              borderColor: 'danger.emphasis',
              boxShadow: 'none'
            },
            mr: 2,
            '& > input': {
              textAlign: 'center',
              pr: 0.5,
              pl: 0.5,
              width: '5ch'
            }
          }}
          className={qtyValidity.isValid ? '' : 'error'}
          {...testIdProps('duration-quantity-input')}
        />

        <ValidationErrorPopover
          message={qtyValidity.message}
          id={qtyValidationMessageId}
          testId="duration-quantity-validation-message"
        />
      </Box>

usage.name: ActionMenu
usage.text:
<ActionMenu>
        <ActionMenu.Button
          sx={{
            flex: 1,
            gridTemplateColumns: 'min-content 1fr min-content',
            '[data-component=text]': {textAlign: 'left'},
            ...(inline ? HiddenButtonStyle : {})
          }}
          aria-label="Units"
          {...testIdProps('duration-units-button')}
        >
          <Text
            sx={inline ? {color: 'fg.muted', fontWeight: 400} : {flex: 1, textAlign: 'left'}}
            {...testIdProps('duration-units-value')}
          >
            {value.units}
          </Text>
        </ActionMenu.Button>
        <ActionMenu.Overlay>
          <ActionList selectionVariant="single">
            {unitItems.map((unitItem, index) => (
              <ActionList.Item
                {...unitItem}
                key={unitItem.key}
                selected={unitItem.key === value.units}
                onSelect={() => onUnitsChange(unitItem)}
              />
            ))}
          </ActionList>
        </ActionMenu.Overlay>
      </ActionMenu>

usage.text:
<Box
      role="row"
      sx={{
        ...BaseIterationRowStyle,
        backgroundColor: (theme: FixMeTheme) =>
          labelType === 'break' ? theme.colors.canvas.subtle : theme.colors.canvas.default,
        boxShadow: (theme: FixMeTheme) => (isDirty ? `2px 0 0 ${theme.colors.accent.fg} inset` : undefined)
      }}
    >
      <IterationRowLabel labelType={labelType} sx={{pt: localTitle ? '2px' : undefined}} />

      <Box sx={{flexDirection: 'column', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'flex-start', gap: 1}}>
        {(localTitle || originalTitle) && (
          <Box sx={{flexDirection: 'row', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
            <DiffValue
              sx={{fontWeight: 600, fontSize: 2}}
              originalValue={originalTitle}
              updatedValue={localTitle}
              testId="iteration-title-diff"
              renderUpdatedValue={_ => <TitleInput value={localTitle} onChange={onTitleChange} />}
            />
          </Box>
        )}

        <Box sx={{flexDirection: 'row', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
          <DiffValue
            originalValue={intervalDatesDescription(originalInterval)}
            updatedValue={intervalDatesDescription(localInterval)}
            testId="iteration-dates-diff"
            renderOriginalValue={() => (
              <>
                <Text sx={{fontWeight: 600}}>{intervalDurationDescription(originalInterval)}</Text>
                  
                <Text>{intervalDatesDescription(originalInterval)}</Text>
              </>
            )}
            renderUpdatedValue={() => (
              <>
                <Text sx={{fontWeight: 600}}>{intervalDurationDescription(localInterval)}</Text>  
                <IntervalDatePicker value={localInterval} onChange={onIntervalChange} minDate={minAllowedDate} />
              </>
            )}
          />
        </Box>
      </Box>

      <DeleteButton onClick={onRemove} />
    </Box>

usage.name: Box
usage.text:
<Box
      role="tablist"
      aria-disabled={disabled}
      sx={{
        ...BaseIterationRowStyle,
        bg: 'canvas.subtle',
        p: 0,
        alignItems: 'center'
      }}
    >
      <StyledButton
        key="active"
        role="tab"
        selected={selectedTab === 'active'}
        {...testIdProps('active-iterations')}
        onClick={() => {
          if (!disabled) setSelectedTab('active')
        }}
        aria-label="Active iterations"
        aria-disabled={disabled}
        disabled={disabled}
      >
        <StyledOcticon icon={ClockIcon} sx={{color: 'inherit', mr: 2}} aria-label="Active iterations" />
        <Text>{activeIterationsCount} Active</Text>
      </StyledButton>

      <StyledButton
        key="completed"
        role="tab"
        selected={selectedTab === 'completed'}
        {...testIdProps('completed-iterations')}
        onClick={() => {
          if (!disabled) setSelectedTab('completed')
        }}
        aria-label="Completed iterations"
        aria-disabled={disabled}
        disabled={disabled}
      >
        <StyledOcticon icon={ArchiveIcon} sx={{color: 'inherit', mr: 2}} aria-label="Completed iterations" />
        <Text>{completedIterationsCount} Completed</Text>
      </StyledButton>

      {selectedTab === 'active' && (
        <Box sx={{ml: 'auto', mr: 3}}>
          <NewIterationModalButton {...addButtonProps} />
        </Box>
      )}
    </Box>

usage.name: ButtonGroup
usage.text:
<ButtonGroup sx={{display: 'flex'}}>
      <Button
        size="small"
        onClick={() => onCreate(minimumStartDate, defaultDuration)}
        leadingIcon={PlusIcon}
        sx={{display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center'}}
        {...testIdProps('add-default-iteration-button')}
      >
        Add iteration
      </Button>

      <AnchoredOverlay
        renderAnchor={props => (
          <Button
            trailingIcon={TriangleDownIcon}
            size="small"
            sx={{lineHeight: '22px'}}
            {...testIdProps('add-custom-iteration-button')}
            {...props}
          >
            More options
          </Button>
        )}
        width="medium"
        open={overlayOpen}
        onOpen={openOverlay}
        onClose={closeOverlay}
        focusZoneSettings={{bindKeys: FocusKeys.Tab}}
        align="end"
        overlayProps={{...testIdProps('custom-iteration-modal'), sx: {overflow: 'visible'}}}
      >
        <form onSubmit={onSave}>
          <Box sx={{p: 3, borderBottom: '1px solid', borderColor: 'border.muted'}}>
            <NewIterationOptions
              startDate={selectedStartDate}
              onStartDateChange={setSelectedStartDate}
              duration={selectedDuration}
              onDurationChange={setSelectedDuration}
              onValidChange={setInputValid}
              minStartDate={minimumStartDate}
            />
          </Box>

          <Box
            sx={{
              display: 'flex',
              justifyContent: 'flex-end',
              p: 3,
              pt: 2,
              pb: 2,
              gap: 2
            }}
          >
            <Button size="small" onClick={closeOverlay} {...testIdProps('cancel-add-custom-iteration')} type="button">
              Cancel
            </Button>
            <Button
              variant="primary"
              size="small"
              type="submit"
              disabled={!inputValid}
              {...testIdProps('save-add-custom-iteration')}
            >
              Add
            </Button>
          </Box>
        </form>
      </AnchoredOverlay>
    </ButtonGroup>

usage.text:
<Box
      sx={{
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
        backgroundColor: 'canvas.default',
        width: '100%',
        overflow: 'auto',
        justifyContent: 'space-between'
      }}
    >
      <Box sx={{mt: 4, mx: [3, '', 4]}}>
        <Box sx={{display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', mb: 3}}>
          <Text sx={{fontWeight: '600', fontSize: 3}}>Add from repository</Text>
          <IconButton
            variant="invisible"
            icon={XIcon}
            sx={{color: 'fg.default', px: 0}}
            onClick={onClose}
            {...testIdProps('side-panel-button-close')}
          />
        </Box>
        <Box sx={{display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'flex-start'}}>
          <RepoSuggestions key="repoSuggestions" />
          <TextInput
            sx={{flex: 1, ml: 2}}
            disabled={!hasRepos}
            leadingVisual={SearchIcon}
            aria-label="Search for issues and pull requests"
            ref={inputRef}
            type="text"
            placeholder="Search for issues and pull requests"
            onChange={onSearchInputChange}
            onFocus={onSearchInputFocus}
            onBlur={onSearchInputBlur}
            {...searchInputProps}
            size="small"
            trailingAction={
              searchButtonVisible ? (
                <SearchButton onClick={onSearchButtonClick} disabled={searchButtonDisabled} />
              ) : undefined
            }
            {...testIdProps('suggested-items-search-input')}
          />
        </Box>
        <ItemSuggestionsList />
      </Box>
      <Box
        sx={{
          position: 'sticky',
          zIndex: '1',
          display: 'flex',
          justifyContent: 'flex-end',
          bottom: '0',
          backgroundColor: 'canvas.default',
          borderTop: '1px solid',
          borderColor: 'border.default',
          width: '100%'
        }}
      >
        <Button
          variant="primary"
          onClick={addSelectedItems}
          {...testIdProps('bulk-add-button')}
          disabled={loading || addingItems || items?.length === 0 || selectedItems.length === 0}
          sx={{my: 3, mr: 4}}
        >
          {!addingItems ? 'Add selected items' : selectedItems.length === 1 ? 'Adding item...' : 'Adding items...'}
        </Button>
      </Box>
    </Box>
